entries.name: Vengador de Abadar
entries.description:
Hao Jin really has some nerve for a supposed disciple of Abadar. First, she dares to start a collection of trinkets in hopes of emulating the great Abadar's unsurpassable First Vault. As if that weren't enough, she also sets up a contest to give away her most powerful treasures to anyone who can throw a punch! Abadar hasn't directly told you as much, per se, but surely this kind of hubris can't sit well with your beloved deity, regardless of Hao Jin's own supposed ties to the Master of the First Vault. At the very least, someone's got to check out this shoddy imitation of the First Vault y write a report for the church of Abadar - y you've decided that someone is you.

With or without the blessing of an actual priest of Abadar, you've taken it upon yourself to investigate Hao Jin's "wondrous" vault by winning her Ruby Phoenix Tournament. You read a few flyers about the tournament's home city y joined the first team that could hyle your righteous zealotry, but any more preparation would be a waste of time. You clearly have the divine will of Abadar on your side (but again, no actual proof of this), which is all you'll need to win this tournament y dispel any notions of Hao Jin's ties to your patron deity.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Carisma o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religion y the Goka Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}skill feat with Religion.

entries.name: Academy Dropout
entries.description:
You were enrolled at a prestigious magical academy, but you've since dropped out. Maybe there was a momentous incident, maybe you had to return to other responsibilities, or perhaps it was just too much for you. Whatever the case, your exit from the academy has shaped your life as much as your entrance y led you to a life of adventure.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Arcana y Academia Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Acólito
entries.description:
Pasaste tus primeros días en un monasterio o claustro religioso. Puedes haber viajado por todo el mundo para extender el mensaje de tu religión, o porque dejaste a un lado las enseñanzas de tu fe, pero en lo más profundo de tu interior siempre llevarás contigo las lecciones que aprendiste.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y Saber de la escritura. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x7EMZNMavris2aHY]{Alumno del canon}.

entries.name: Acróbata
entries.description:
En un circo o en las calles, te ganaste el sustento haciendo de acróbata. Podrías haberte decidido por las aventuras cuyo se te acabó el dinero, o simplemente cuyo decidiste dar un uso mejor a tus habilidades.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Acrobacias y Saber del circo. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CnqMJR8e9jqJR7MM]{Equilibrio firme}.

entries.name: Aerialist
entries.description:
Experienced with trapezes, aerial silks, y hoops, your skill is in performing death-defying stunts high above the ground. The Celestial Menagerie skimped on safety devices such as nets y quality ropes, so you also learned to take a fall better than most. After a harrowing near-death experience involving a cracked trapeze bar, you decided to take your expertise elsewhere.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Acrobacias y the Rope Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Caída de gato}.

entries.name: Aiudara Seeker
entries.description:
[Legacy - Age of Ashes]

The aiudara of Alseta's Ring have become more well known, y you are interested in learning more about them.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y the Portal Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification}.

entries.name: Alkenstar Outlaw
entries.description:
You're an outlaw whose first crime was stealing the guns from Alkenstar's Gunworks which allowed you to commence a crime spree of epic proportions. You don't know where your road ends, but it's probably going to be a bloody affair. The life of an adventurer might even be a relief compared to a life forever on the run from Alkenstar authorities y their allies.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One boost must be to Destreza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Thievery y Underworld Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hVZbnsDuXihggylt]{Subtle Theft}.

entries.name: Alkenstar Sojourner
entries.description:
You came to Alkenstar because you heard they had guns, but you stayed because of the atmosphere. Or the guns. Either way, journalism y scientific curiosity opened the door to a life of adventure. Now you continue to adventure in the Alkenstar area, using your skills to deal with whatever situations present themselves.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Society y Engineering Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Callejeo}.

entries.name: Alkenstar Tinker
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lys

Your dedication to the scientific inquiry of your native Alkenstar provides great insight into mechanical y chemical innovation.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting}.

entries.name: Amnesiac
entries.description:
Your background is… well… honestly, you can't remember! You might have inklings deep within your mind, undercurrents of unusual emotions or unexpected responses to certain people or situations, but ultimately you don't know who you once were. You might be adventuring specifically to help discover yourself. It's up to you y the GM how to hyle the truth of your character's backstory. You could leave it to the GM so it's a secret, work together with the GM, or even choose to leave it undecided until later. In any case, you y your GM should determine a few noteworthy details about your character or their belongings to get the first clues to your past.

You gain three free ability boosts. You choose two, y the GM chooses the third based on their first inklings of your character's possible history.

entries.name: Susurrador de animales
entries.description:
iempre has notado una conexión con los animales, y sólo te costó un esfuerzo mínimo aprender a entrenarlos. Cuando viajas, te encuentras continuamente con diferentes criaturas, haciéndote amigo de ellas por el camino.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y y en una habilidad de Saber relacionada con un terreno habitado por animales que te gustan (como por ejemplo Saber de las llanuras o Saber de los pantanos). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nowEaHgIyij7im8F]{Adiestrar animal}.

entries.name: Animal Wrangler (Athletics)
entries.description:
You have a long history of working with large circus animals for the Celestial Menagerie, such as performing in an animal act, jostling animals back into their cages, or even sweeping dung out of squalid pens. Mistress Dusklight's ongoing mistreatment of her animals compelled you to quit, y you now strive to ensure animals aren't abused.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y a Lore skill related to a particular kind of common animal (such as Equine Lore, Feline Lore, or Pachyderm Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler}.

entries.name: Animal Wrangler (Nature)
entries.description:
You have a long history of working with large circus animals for the Celestial Menagerie, such as performing in an animal act, jostling animals back into their cages, or even sweeping dung out of squalid pens. Mistress Dusklight's ongoing mistreatment of her animals compelled you to quit, y you now strive to ensure animals aren't abused.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y a Lore skill related to a particular kind of common animal (such as Equine Lore, Feline Lore, or Pachyderm Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nowEaHgIyij7im8F]{Adiestrar animal}.

entries.name: Anti-Magical
entries.description:
Magic has never worked quite right around you. Perhaps you have become a magic-user in spite of that, or perhaps you use your unique ability to fight magic-users.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades a Lore skill of your choice, though it can't be about a magical subject (as determined by the GM if it's unclear). Whenever you would be affected by magic, even your own magic or that of an ally, the originator of the effect must attempt a DC 3 flat check.

On a failure, the magic doesn't affect you (though it still has its normal effects on anyone else). On a success, the magic affects you y there is no need to attempt further flat checks for the same magical effect, even if it affects you again later.

entries.name: Anti-Tech Activist
entries.description:
You've seen the sorts of things that technology brings- polluted environments, workers put out of their jobs or horribly injured, y the slow erosion of society-y you've vowed to inform the larger world of these ills. You do so with long, impassioned speeches on street corners y village squares y by talking personally with the heads of various guilds. Adventuring into the wider world could help spread your message even farther.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y Saber gremial. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Intimidación de grupo}.

entries.name: Archaeologist
entries.description:
You've excavated enough sites to know that ancient civilizations aren't lost; they're merely buried y waiting for the right scholar to unearth them y tell their story. You might have worked as a laborer or local guide before learning formal archaeological techniques.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Architecture Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore}skill feat related to an ancient culture or the history of a culture you've studied (such as Azlanti Lore or Osirian History Lore).

entries.name: Artesano
entries.description:
Como aprendiz, has practicado una forma particular de construir o fabricar, desarrollando una habilidad especializada. Podrías haber sido un aprendiz de herrero, trabajando en la forja durante muchas horas, un joven sastre cosiendo ropa de todo tipo o un carpintero naval dando forma al casco de los barcos.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza oInteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber gremial. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Especialidad artesana}.

entries.name: Artista
entries.description:
Tu arte es tu mayor pasión, sea cual sea la forma que adopta. Salir de aventuras te podría ayudar a encontrar la inspiración, o simplemente ser la forma de sobrevivir hasta que te conviertas en un artista de fama mundial.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber artístico. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Especialidad artesana}.

entries.name: Aspiring Free-Captain
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

You seek to join the Free Captains of the Shackles y have learned everything you need to know about sailing y bossing people around. Now you just need a crew y a ship.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y Saber de la navegación. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Intimidación de grupo}.

entries.name: Aspiring River Monarch
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lys

New realms rise constantly in the River Kingdoms, y you intend to lead one of them. Making your reign last, however, will require both strength y grace.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Politics Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JtjnFsOToBLnSRO9]{Gracia cortesana}.

entries.name: Astrologer
entries.description:
Astrologers look to the stars for signs y portents, using their positions to chart courses for those living beneath them. As the celestial spheres move, so does fate itself. You studied the stars y learned to divine your path based on their guidance. Whether the stars directly called you to a life of adventure or you use the stars to guide your wyerlust, you're living out the stars' guidance in a life of adventure.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Occultism y Astrology Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Identificar extrañezas}.

entries.name: Attention Addict
entries.description:
A roaring crowd chanting your name. Your face plastered all over the city. Fawning fans begging for your autograph. Jealous rivals. Endless fame. The promise of all this y more is what drove you to enter this year's Ruby Phoenix Tournament, y with your prodigious star power it's no wonder why they selected you for the prequalifier on Danger Isly. You've got champion stamped all over you. Obviously, the organizers knew a winner when they saw one. It's already clear that you'll be named Ruby Phoenix Champion - the challenges leading up to your prize ceremony are mere formalities, but you're happy to indulge the impassioned masses. After all, the people want a show, y what kind of celebrity would you be if you denied them? You might even deign to compete in some fights, too, as long as your hair doesn't get mussed.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Performance y Saber de los gladiadores. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{Interpretación impresionante}skill feat

entries.name: Atteran Rancher
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Old Cheliax

You grew up breeding y training the famous horses of the Atteran Ranches in northern Nidal. You may even be sympathetic to the Desnan dissidents who hide there from the Umbral Court.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y the Animal Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nowEaHgIyij7im8F]{Adiestrar animal}.

entries.name: Back-Alley Doctor
entries.description:
You're the medic many turn to when a more official clinic or healer might not be available. You may specialize in stitching up bullet wounds or have a stying, confidential deal with a criminal syndicate to provide your services any time of day or night. In either case, you've perhaps turned to the adventuring life because a former client is unhappy with your work or members of the local constabulary have been asking too many questions.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bkZgWFSFV4cAf5Ot]{Cirugía arriesgada}.

entries.name: Bandido
entries.description:
Tu pasado incluye una gran cantidad de bandolerismo rural, robando a los viajeros en los caminos para subsistir. Tanto si tus robos fueron autorizados por un noble local como si los llevaste a cabo por tu cuenta, al final te viste envuelto en la vida aventurera. Ahora, la aventura es tu especialidad y los años de acampada y escaramuzas no han hecho más que ayudarte.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y en una habilidad de Saber relacionada con el terreno en el que trabajaras (como Saber del desierto o Saber de las llanuras). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Intimidación de grupo}.

entries.name: Banished Brighite
entries.description:
Once, you were a dedicated y important priest of Brigh, goddess of clockwork y invention, based out of the largest church to your deity, the Temple of Brigh in Alkenstar. Here, you made important discoveries in the annals of your religion's canon y furthered the Bronze Lady's agendas of innovation y creation. Your future seemed bright, y you predicted that it was only a matter of time until you ascended to the rank of primary cog or, someday, gry cog.

Then, your years of devout service were undone in an instant. A man named Ambrost Mugly came to the Temple y demyed not only access to the religious formulas you'd been uncovering, but exclusive rights to the precious knowledge. When you refused, Mugly sent word to the church's leaders that you'd been meddling in heretical doctrine. He also implicated you in the theft of church funds that had mysteriously gone missing as of late. Sure enough, you found yourself being asked to hy in your robes. Your church colleagues didn't turn you in, but they told you in no uncertain terms that you wouldn't be able to find sanctuary for your alleged crimes in the halls of the Temple of Brigh.

On the run y with nowhere to turn, your faith has been thoroughly tested, though so far you've remained true to your religion y maintained your sacred skills y divine powers. It's unclear what the Bronze Lady has in store for you, but at least one thing's for certain: Ambrost Mugly will pay for what he did.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y the Brigh Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification}.

entries.name: Barbero
entries.description:
Cortes de pelo, odontología, sangrías y cirugías: si se requiere una mano firme y una navaja, tú te encargas. Puede que te hayas lanzado a la carretera para ampliar tus habilidades o para ponerte a prueba en un mundo que deja a tus pacientes tan maltrechos y magullados.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y en la habilidad Saber de la Cirugía. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bkZgWFSFV4cAf5Ot]{Cirugía arriesgada} (pág 203).

entries.name: Barman
entries.description:
Tienes cinco especialidades: levantar barriles, beber, pulir jarras, beber y beber. Has trabajado en un bar, donde aprendiste a resistir el licor y a socializar de forma bulliciosa.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y Saber del alcohol. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Confraternización}.

entries.name: Barker
entries.description:
You're skilled at shouting to catch y keep the attention of passersby. A few well-timed y forcefully spoken words not only get people to notice you but also engage them to respond to you. You may have previously worked as a crier or in a more formal barker capacity with Mistress Dusklight's Celestial Menagerie. Either way, your ability to bully a crowd is impressive.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación, y the Crowd Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Intimidación de grupo}.

entries.name: Abogado
entries.description:
Montones de textos legales, unos profesores austeros y mucha experiencia en los tribunales te han instruido en los asuntos legales. Eres capaz de organizar una acusación o una defensa en un tribunal, y tiendes a estar al día de las leyes locales, puesto que nunca se puede decir cuándo vas a necesitar dicho conocimiento a corto plazo.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y Saber legal. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Impresión de grupo}.

entries.name: Bekyar Restorer
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

Though many Bekyars worship demons, you seek to pave a different path for yourself y your kindred, while also attempting to change other Mwangi's treatment of your culture.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Abyss Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Impresión de grupo}.

entries.name: Belkzen Slayer
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

You are a fearsome warrior from the Hold of Belkzen, y your clan counts on you for support, counsel, y defense. With the rising threat of the Whispering Tyrant threatening the safety of your home, you must not let your people down.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y the Orc Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Mirada intimidante}.

entries.name: Bellflower Agent
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Old Cheliax

You joined a secret society dedicated to freeing halfling slaves, most likely from the cruelty of Chelish reign. You know how to smuggle people in y out of countries.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t3btih0O5RUwWynt]{Contrabandista experto}.

entries.name: Bibliophile
entries.description:
You love few things more than a good book, y as a result, Odd Stories is your favorite shop in Otari. The bookseller Morlibint supplies you with fiction, anthologies, y other delightful reads, y he's always eager to discuss his latest finds with you. You know that imagination is the greatest magic, but a working knowledge of actual magic helps, too.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y the Library Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blMeVamjGz4ODWxq]{Arcane Sense}.

entries.name: Black Market Smuggler
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

You know how to work the less-than-legal side of the region's markets y know how to slip contraby past the authorities.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t3btih0O5RUwWynt]{Contrabandista experto}.

entries.name: Blessed
entries.description:
You have been blessed by a divinity. For an unknown reason, y irrespective of your actual beliefs, a deity has granted you a boon to use for good or ill. Your blessing grants wisdom y insight to aid you in your struggles. You may or may not even know the identity of the being who blessed you, y the blessing might come with a cost you discover later on.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

You are trained in a Lore skill associated with the deity who blessed you (such as Shelyn Lore) if you know their identity, or else in a Lore skill of the GM's choice if you don't. Either you can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance} as a divine innate spell at will, or you gain a similar blessing determined by the GM.

entries.name: Blow-In (Deception)
entries.description:
You never expected to join a circus, but you were looking for a good place to lie low for reasons of your own. The Circus of Wayward Wonders came together with several different workers y performers a few months ago. Many came from a circus in Escadar called the Celestial Menagerie, but not all of them. It was easy to slip in among the roustabouts. Although you'd planned to move on quickly, the circus folk have adopted you as one of their own, y they don't ask questions about your past.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HEBXaS656MZTiWFu]{Lengthy Diversion}.

entries.name: Blow-In (Thievery)
entries.description:
You never expected to join a circus, but you were looking for a good place to lie low for reasons of your own. The Circus of Wayward Wonders came together with several different workers y performers a few months ago. Many came from a circus in Escadar called the Celestial Menagerie, but not all of them. It was easy to slip in among the roustabouts. Although you'd planned to move on quickly, the circus folk have adopted you as one of their own, y they don't ask questions about your past.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Latrocinio y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hVZbnsDuXihggylt]{Subtle Theft}.

entries.name: Bonuwat Wavetouched
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

You are a child of the Bonuwat people, y the sea's salt flows through your veins. You've taken to sailing y swimming gracefully y with ease, earning you the honorific "wavetouched."

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Ocean Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iOY6YfGBaOvMNAor]{Merodeador subactuático}.

entries.name: Bookkeeper
entries.description:
You ran the numbers on a large farm, for a merchant's endeavors, or with a major guild in the city. You kept track of expenses, payroll, profits, y anything else that had to do with money, for better or worse. If better, you might be adventuring to learn how others ply this trade. If worse, you may be fleeing from impending consequences, in the hope that no one finds you.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Accounting Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0N8TtGSk5enoLBZ8]{Eye For Numbers}.

entries.name: Cazarrecompensas
entries.description:
Llevar ante un tribunal a los prófugos de la ley te llenaba los bolsillos. Quizás lo hacías por un motivo altruista y buscabas encerrar a los delincuentes para que las calles fueran más seguras, o quizás el dinero fuera motivo suficiente. Tus técnicas para perseguir delincuentes son fácilmente transferibles a la vida de un aventurero.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y Saber legal. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.urQZwmzg2kS53vd5]{Rastrador experto}.

entries.name: Bright Lion
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

You are a member of the Bright Lions y seek to overthrow the tyrannical reign of Walkena y free Mzali from his cruel whims. You're experienced operating undercover y have had to be cautious of what you say y who you trust, lest you fall afoul of the god-king's terrible punishments.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y the Mzali Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Miénteme}.

entries.name: Broken Tusk Recruiter
entries.description:
Your gifted tongue, friendly demeanor, y deep knowledge of Broken Tusk culture y traditions make you an ideal recruiter for new followers. Whenever Broken Tusks come upon weak, weary, or wyering souls, you're often the first sent to meet these folks y determine if they would be a good fit for the following.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Hillcross Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Impresión de grupo}.

entries.name: Butcher
entries.description:
You've spent uncounted hours walking up y down crowded y noisy circus stys, inventing innovative means to sell refreshments, food, y novelties at inflated prices. (You might know very little about slaughtering animals; "butcher" is a circus slang term for a vendor.) The Celestial Menagerie constantly pushed you to figure out how to sell increasingly shoddy toys to children y how to conceal the taste of spoiled treats that should have been discarded days earlier. You peddled disappointment y hated it, so you left to seek a new line of work-although you're not yet willing to leave the circus life altogether.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber mercantil. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yUuU9xyotrpwpTyC]{Read Lips}.

entries.name: Cannoneer
entries.description:
You served as a crewmate aboard a military vessel or pirate ship y were responsible for the use y maintenance of the ship's cannons. A strong back y quick reflexes were equally important to you in your duties, y you know your way around explosives y the dangers that lie therein. These skills serve you well in your new life as an adventurer, as compared to the weight of a cannon, a gear load that makes your allies blanche just makes you laugh instead.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One boost must be to Destreza o Fuerza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C0Tcelg3BAPhML6J]{Porteador recio}.

entries.name: Charlatán
entries.description:
Has viajado de un lugar a otro, vendiendo falsos amuletos y aceite de serpiente en una población, y pretendiendo pertenecer a la realeza en el exilio para seducir a una rica heredera en la siguiente. Convertirte en un aventurero podría ser tu próxima gran estafa o un intento de poner tu talento al servicio de una causa mayor. Quizá se trate un poco de ambas cosas, puesto que te das cuenta de que, después de haber pretendido ser un héroe, te has convertido en una máscara.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Mentiroso encantador}.

entries.name: Chelish Rebel
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Old Cheliax

You joined the fight against House Thrune. You may have helped liberate the nation of Ravounel, or you might be involved in another rebellion, such as Pezzack's, that studied Ravounel's successes.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Kintargo Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Callejeo}.

entries.name: Child of the Puddles
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom y Starstone Isle

You grew up in the soggy, squalid quarter of Absalom known as the Puddles. You're at home in tightly packed urban environments.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Acrobatics skill, y the Absalom Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CnqMJR8e9jqJR7MM]{Equilibrio firme}.

entries.name: Child of Westcrown
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Old Cheliax

Whether you come from Westcrown or elsewhere, you hold the values of pre-Thrune Cheliax dear. You disdain the infernal government, but you are proud of your country y do not consider yourself a rebel.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Westcrown Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Impresión de grupo}.

entries.name: Chosen One
entries.description:
Your birth has fulfilled a prediction, y people close to you are counting on you to do great things. There's intense pressure on you to be up to the task, y the fickle nature of prophecy complicates your path.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Decide with your GM the basics of the prophecy in which you're meant to play a major part. Estás entrenado en las habilidades one skill related to the prophecy, y Saber de la adivinación. You gain the Prophecy's Pawn free action.

Note: You must select the skill manually y add the Prophecy's Pawn action

entries.name: Circuit Judge
entries.description:
You're a circuit judge, a courtroom on horseback who serves a group of communities out in the Mana Wastes or a similar backwoods region. You show up every couple of months, hear the cases that have piled up since your last visit, give verdicts, y then it's on to the next town in your itinerary. It's not the easiest life in the world, but it's an interesting one, y you hear some mighty strange cases. Chances are, it was one of those cases that set you on the road to adventure.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Deception y Legal Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Miénteme}.

entries.name: Circus Born
entries.description:
The itinerant life of a traveling circus performer is nothing new to you; you were born y raised in the circus. You've seen more acts than you can count y grew up hearing the tall tales of circus performers while gathered around their campfires. You've experienced the thrill of captivating crowd ever since you were young. You may have tried a few times to settle down, but the lure of the open road y the glamor of the big top always called you back.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y Saber del circo. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{Experienced Professional}.

entries.name: Clockfighter
entries.description:
While others choose to use their engineering ability to heal the injured or make brilliant innovations, you've used your skill to repair y modify clockwork constructs that battle in gladiatorial combat. You know how to get a crowd electrified for your clockwork gladiator, win or lose, y you know how to repair it when it gets damaged. These skills serve you well as an adventurer.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber de los gladiadores. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{Experienced Professional}.

entries.name: Clockwork Researcher
entries.description:
New forms of clockwork technology are incredibly interesting to you, y you've been studying examples of them to see where else they might be best put to use. You might eventually develop a new prototype machine or find a way to make related technologies practical enough for everyone to benefit. Though before you do, you must continue your research!

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0N8TtGSk5enoLBZ8]{Eye For Numbers}.

entries.name: Clown
entries.description:
Although you've spent time in greasepaint y colorful clothing to amuse crowds, your skills with buffoonery y physical comedy are exceptional whether or not you're in costume. In the employ of Mistress Dusklight's Celestial Menagerie, you spent too many routines distracting an audience from an ill-timed accident or evidence of abused animals or performers. You've had enough of that, y the Celestial Menagerie isn't your home any longer.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y the Clown Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lFwfUvH2708rl6i3]{Virtuosic Performer (Comedy)}.

entries.name: Codebreaker
entries.description:
Whether you're employed by a military organization to decipher coded messages sent by enemy factions or work independently to crack an enigma created by a past civilization, you have a head for patterns y linguistics. You might even use new clockwork devices to aid you in your efforts.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Cryptography Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WeQGWvlWdeLeOlCN]{Glean Contents}.

entries.name: Cook
entries.description:
You grew up in the kitchens of a tavern or other dining establishment y excelled there, becoming an exceptional cook. Baking, cooking, a little brewing on the side-you've spent lots of time out of sight. It's about time you went out into the world to catch some sights for yourself.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Cooking Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Eceqc6zbMj2x0q9]{Seasoned}.

entries.name: Courier
entries.description:
In your youth, you earned coin running messages for persons of wealth y influence, darting through crowded cobblestone streets. Your dogged commitment to deliver your message was good training for the life of an adventurer.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Lore skill for the city in which you were raised. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WeQGWvlWdeLeOlCN]{Glean Contents}.

entries.name: Delincuente
entries.description:
Como un independiente carente de escrúpulos o como miembro de una organización de los bajos fondos, viviste una vida delictiva. Te podrías haber convertido en aventurero en busca de redención, para huir de la ley o simplemente para tener acceso a más y mejor botín.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t3btih0O5RUwWynt]{Contrabandista experto}.

entries.name: Cultist
entries.description:
You were (or still are) a member of a cult whose rites may involve sacred dances to ensure a strong harvest or dire rituals that call upon dark powers. You might have taken up adventuring to further your cult's aims, to initiate yourself into the world's gryer mysteries, or to flee unsavory practices or strictures.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y the Lore skill related to your deity or cult. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lEgYzFHransLkSvI]{Schooled In Secrets}.

entries.name: Curyero
entries.description:
You learned the healing arts of your community wielding your ceremonial chonta, a tool you carved yourself y imbued with sacred oils y herbs. This process opened your eyes to ailments of a more mystical nature: malefic spirits, haunts, possession, y more. You likely took up adventuring to combat these horrors, or you may have fled an evil beyond your power to vanquish.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y Saber del herbolario. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMCpihnBEpx18GBD]{Inoculation}.

entries.name: Cursed
entries.description:
You are the victim of a personal or hereditary curse. Through great effort y occult study, you have learned to fend off the curse's worst effects y, by extension, you can protect yourself against other harmful magic. However, the curse still hangs over you y sometimes manifests in dangerous ways.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

You are trained in Occultism y Curse Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7pdG8l9POMK76Lf2]{Warding Sign}reaction. You y the GM should determine the full effects of the curse, though you've staved most of them off for now. The GM determines the curse's lingering manifestations on you, which usually include at least a constant or very frequent thematic effect y occasional more dangerous effects.

entries.name: Cursed Family
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

Rumors abound that your family is cursed. While that would explain several unfortunate events in your family history, you may or may not believe it. Regardless, odd coincidences plague your lineage, y perhaps even appear in your own life, y you have become used to spotting strangeness around you.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y the Curse Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Identificar extrañezas}.

entries.name: Deckhy
entries.description:
The rolling waves of the high seas, the constant sway of the deck underfoot, y the creaking heights of a ship's rigging are as familiar to you as solid ground. You might have worked on a simple fishing boat, a wealthy merchant's galley, a mighty warship - or even a pirate's caravel. Whether your crew retired, your ship sank, or you've turned to adventuring so you can keep all the treasure for yourself, you still retain an excellent sense of balance y quick reflexes.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Fuerza y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Acrobatics skill, y Saber de la navegación. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Caída de gato}.

entries.name: Demon Slayer
entries.description:
For over a century, Mendev led a multinational coalition against ever-growing abyssal invaders in the Worldwound, y the Pathfinder Society aided in the so-called Fifth Crusade that ultimately sealed the planar rift y defeated its demon armies. You might be a hardened recruit who clashed with the demons, or perhaps you were a survivor who lost everything to the fiendish armies y narrowly escaped-or was rescued by Pathfinders. Your exposure to the Worldwound has taught you vital lessons in identifying fiends y their magic.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y the Demon Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}skill feat. Add Abyssal to the list of additional languages you can learn for having a high Intelligence modifier.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 5 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Deputy
entries.description:
While your life may have taken some twists y turns in the intervening years, you were once deputized as the lawful protector of a community. While the role was temporary y you've since turned in your badge, that responsibility shaped you. Whenever a community is in trouble, y the sheriff is nowhere to be found, residents call on you to capture a criminal, rescue the mayor's offspring from byits, or go toe to toe with outlaws.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Hunting Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.urQZwmzg2kS53vd5]{Rastrador experto}.

entries.name: Desert Tracker
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

You're at home blazing trails in the burning sys, y you made a living guiding or following creatures in the desert. You might be a native nomad, an experienced desert guide, a naturalist, a byit driven into the dunes by the law-or all of the above.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Desert Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.urQZwmzg2kS53vd5]{Rastrador experto}.

entries.name: Detective
entries.description:
Resolviste delitos como inspector de policía o bien aceptaste trabajos de clientes ricos como investigador privado. Podrías haberte convertido en aventurero como parte de tu próximo gran misterio, pero probablemente fuera debido a las consecuencias o al desenlace de un caso anterior.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Callejeo}.

entries.name: Diobel Pearl Diver
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom y Starstone Isle

You spent a portion of your youth diving y gathering precious pearls under the attentive eyes of Kortos Consortium merchants.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Ocean Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iOY6YfGBaOvMNAor]{Merodeador subactuático}.

entries.name: Discarded Duplicate
entries.description:
Someone created you for a specific purpose. Some important person, be they a storied royal, a contentious politician, or a stark military leader, needed a body double for their most dangerous appearances. Using a mixture of fringe science y magic, you were commissioned y trained to emulate this person in every way, y have stood in for them in countless deadly circumstances. You may or may not know the reason behind your decommissioning, but whoever discarded you didn't finish you off. Now, the world is yours to explore-but "you" may have a bold or brutish reputation, or the individual you were duplicating may be long dead. Regardless of the fate of this individual, your way of life has changed drastically.

You y the GM can work out how to incorporate your previous life into your story. The GM can keep this knowledge hidden even from you, or you or another character know what happened. You y the GM can also leave the information unspecified y fill it in later.

You gain three free ability boosts. You choose two, y the GM chooses one based on the attributes of the character you were built to duplicate.

entries.name: Disciple of the Gear
entries.description:
While many regard science y faith as incompatible, you believe scientific advancement is your deity's will. Perhaps you're a follower of Brigh, Casyalee, or some other god of technology, or perhaps you see the furnaces y sparks of modernity as the latest manifestation of Sarenrae's flame or Gozreh's lightning-whatever the case, you're always willing to spread the word of your deity, y you've learned some basic tinkering to show how your deity's focus can increase the common styard of living.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Lore skill for the deity you worship. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ASy9AKEIRxPYUi5o]{Quick Repair}.

entries.name: Dragon Scholar
entries.description:
Dragons have fascinated you for as long as you can remember. The potent power they possess, the long lives they lead, the ancient traditions they inspire-whatever the source of your interest, you've spent much of your life to this point immersed in all things draconic. These studies have bolstered your self-confidence y given you a wide range of methods y tactics you can use to impose your will on others.

You've likely chosen to attend the Call for Heroes as a way to seek funds as an adventurer to afford more texts about dragons or perhaps out of a desire to encounter one in real life.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación, y the Dragon Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Mirada intimidante}.

entries.name: Dreamer of the Verdant Moon
entries.description:
You spent your early days in the aftermath of one of the great ravenings. You survived thanks to your resourcefulness y perhaps your patron's favor y were blessed with skills y drive thereafter, but you must always hold to his styards, lest the hunger from the depths seek you out once again.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Zevgavizeb Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d8AjCqU30z7IOpos]{Ravening's Desperation}.

entries.name: Driver
entries.description:
You practically live behind the controls of a vehicle, y can hyle just about anything the road, waves, y sky can throw at you. You likely adventure to test your skills in unusual environments y new y interesting vehicles.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Acrobacias y the Piloting Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}skill feat with Piloting Lore.

entries.name: Droskari Disciple
entries.description:
You grew up in the church of the Dark Smith, where you learned the value of hard work y achieving vocational mastery.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P6icK2DbRoZ3H6kc]{Skill Training}skill feat, y Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Droskar Lore skill.

entries.name: Early Explorer
entries.description:
In the past decade, the Pathfinder Society has clashed with demonic armies, meddled in politics, y more, but you joined the organization before everything seemed so complicated. Whether you're a dedicated scholar of ruins or an explorer who just longs for months-long expeditions into the wilderness, you're a Pathfinder to explore, report, y cooperate.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Pathfinder Society Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Seasons 0 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Eidolon Contact (Arcana)
entries.description:
You've come into contact with a disembodied being of magical essence known as an eidolon. You might have forged a powerful conduit with that eidolon, allowing you to manifest it as a summoner, but it's much more likely that you lost contact over time, though not before learning a few half-remembered secrets. If you lost contact, you might have become an adventurer to try to reach the eidolon again, or to be sure that you're rid of it forever.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y a Lore skill for the creature associated with your contacted eidolon (such as Angel Lore or Dragon Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Eidolon Contact (Nature)
entries.description:
You've come into contact with a disembodied being of magical essence known as an eidolon. You might have forged a powerful conduit with that eidolon, allowing you to manifest it as a summoner, but it's much more likely that you lost contact over time, though not before learning a few half-remembered secrets. If you lost contact, you might have become an adventurer to try to reach the eidolon again, or to be sure that you're rid of it forever.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y a Lore skill for the creature associated with your contacted eidolon (such as Angel Lore or Dragon Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Eidolon Contact (Occultism)
entries.description:
You've come into contact with a disembodied being of magical essence known as an eidolon. You might have forged a powerful conduit with that eidolon, allowing you to manifest it as a summoner, but it's much more likely that you lost contact over time, though not before learning a few half-remembered secrets. If you lost contact, you might have become an adventurer to try to reach the eidolon again, or to be sure that you're rid of it forever.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y a Lore skill for the creature associated with your contacted eidolon (such as Angel Lore or Dragon Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Eidolon Contact (Religion)
entries.description:
You've come into contact with a disembodied being of magical essence known as an eidolon. You might have forged a powerful conduit with that eidolon, allowing you to manifest it as a summoner, but it's much more likely that you lost contact over time, though not before learning a few half-remembered secrets. If you lost contact, you might have become an adventurer to try to reach the eidolon again, or to be sure that you're rid of it forever.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y a Lore skill for the creature associated with your contacted eidolon (such as Angel Lore or Dragon Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Eldritch Anatomist
entries.description:
You're a trained physician who can ably tend wounds of many kinds. But more than a practitioner, you're a scholar. Some cultures shape flesh to extreme degrees, creating aberrations from humanoid forms. The fleshforges of distant Nex practice this fleshwarping, as do certain subterranean societies you hope to one day study—preferably from a safe y clinical distance.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y the Fleshwarp Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}skill feat with Medicine.

entries.name: Emancipated
entries.description:
Until recently, the nation of Ravounel was part of the larger nation of Cheliax, where the church of Asmodeus is the law y slaves are traded freely in the open market. You had the poor fortune to be born into slavery, but the good luck to have grown up in the city of Kintargo. When Ravounel seceded from Cheliax, the leaders of this new nation freed all slaves, y you've wasted no time in exploring y establishing your new life. How y why you've come to Breachill is left to you to decide-but the fact that you feel empowered to determine your own destiny continues to drive you!

The chance to become an adventurer has excited you for some time, as you hope to build a new life for yourself as a hero rewarded with fame y fortune. Joining the Call for Heroes is a great opportunity to find a group to adventure with.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y the Kintargo Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.beyw5bdA5hkQbmaG]{Terrain Stalker}.

entries.name: Emisario
entries.description:
Como diplomático o mensajero, has viajado por todas partes. Comunicarte con gente nueva y formar alianzas eran tus puntos fuertes.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y a en una habilidad de Saber elacionada con una ciudad que has visitado a menudo. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingüe}.

entries.name: Energy Scarred
entries.description:
Exposure to a significant magical event overloaded you with magical energy. Perhaps you were exposed to dangerous levels of magical energy that left you near death, or it built up over long-term exposure to a powerful source of magic.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One must be Constitution y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Your innate magical trait is primal. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, or sonic. You are trained in a Lore skill associated with the chosen energy (such as Fire Lore) y you gain resistance to that energy type equal to half your level (minimum 1).

entries.name: Animador
entries.description:
Gracias a una educación en las artes o bien debido a la práctica persistente, has aprendido a entretener a las multitudes. Puedes haber sido actor, bailarín, músico, mago callejero o cualquier otro tipo de animador.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y the Theater Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7LB00jkh6JaJr3vS]{Interpretación fascinante}.

entries.name: Ex-Con Token Guard
entries.description:
Not everyone starts life on easy street-your own experience is testament to that. You took a wrong turn at some point early on y became a career criminal. Perhaps you were a petty pickpocket, or maybe you've even murdered someone. Either way, your crimes lyed you with a transformative prison sentence in the Brine prison. Only then did you realize that something needed to change. After your release, you dedicated yourself to helping other downtrodden individuals y those forced to resort to crime to survive. You joined the Coins District Guard, but soon learned that this precinct was a haven for the very corruption you sought to undo. Your efforts at reform never took root y you feared that your decision to become an officer of the law was a huge mistake.

You transferred to the Edgewatch, the Precipice Quarter's new precinct, in the hope that you might meet others who sought to help-not exploit-Absalom's misguided.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Latrocinio y your choice of Legal Lore or Underworld Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}with Token Guards y convicted criminals such as prison inmates. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jDdOqFmZLwE4dblQ]{Carterista}.

entries.name: Ex-Mendevian Crusader
entries.description:
When the Great Quake rumbled across the eastern lys y opened the rift that southerners called "the Worldwound," you answered the call to arms to fight back the demonic hordes. What you saw during the war changed you forever-so much so that you became a wyerer, hermit, or other voluntary outcast. When you came upon the Broken Tusk following, you determined you'd finally found a people whose values y traditions made you feel whole again. The Broken Tusk was supposedly once a much bigger following, y so you've joined them in the hopes of helping them heal old wounds y rebuild in the shadow of loss. In the process, perhaps this new family will help you do the same.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y the Demon Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BqceQIKE0lwIS98s]{Pilgrim's Token}.

entries.name: Faction Opportunist
entries.description:
As the Pathfinder Society's influence has grown, so too did many of its factions become wealthier y more powerful. These factions relied on a host of Pathfinders y independent operatives alike to establish trade networks, shape national politics, y more, y you were among the specialists who helped one of these factions realize its goal. These events provided you countless opportunities to develop your own contacts y negotiating skills.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia, plus either Guild Lore, Heraldry Lore, or Mercantile Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Confraternización}.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 9 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: False Medium
entries.description:
There are people in this world who possess the ability to pierce the veil between the world of the living y the world of the dead, allowing them to communicate with spirits. You... are not one of them. But you know enough about the occult, as well as cold reading tricks y various practices from local religions, to scam your way into people's coinpurses. Unlike a through-y-through charlatan, there's some real occult methodology behind your flimflam, but that's likely cold comfort to the people you swindle. Whether you decided to take a more righteous path, were caught y pledged to make it right, or still slip in a few "séances" between adventures, you've taken to an adventuring lifestyle as you move from place to place.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Occultism y Fortune-Telling Lore.

Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.r7cgrrHh75R8UEqN]{Deceptive Worship}.

entries.name: Labrador
entries.description:
Con una espalda fuerte y una comprensión de los ciclos estacionales, arabas la tierra y te ocupabas de las cosechas. Tu granja pudo haber sido arrasada por unos invasores, pudiste haber perdido la familia que te vinculaba a la tierra o simplemente te pudiste haber cansado del trabajo pesado, pero en algún momento te convertiste en aventurero.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y Saber de la agricultura. Con el Atletismo obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}.

entries.name: Farmsteader
entries.description:
You built your house using wood from the trees surrounding it. Raised it up from the dirt y called it home. You thought that it would be where you would grow old y die. But despite your best efforts, you were wrong. The ly that once gave you food fell fallow, y dust took to the air y choked the livestock. Now you wyer the world as an adventurer. Are you in search of a new place to settle down y try again, or have you become disillusioned by your old dreams, leading you to seek out a new purpose?

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y Saber de la agricultura. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

entries.name: Feral Child
entries.description:
You spent your youth in the wilderness, living close to or perhaps raised by animals. You have a close, mystical connection with these animals y gained certain abilities from them, though this limited your well-roundedness in mental pursuits.

Choose one ability boost. It must be Fuerza, Destreza, o Constitution.

You are trained in Nature y Survival. You gain@Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{Low-Light Vision}(or @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{Darkvision}if you already had Low-Light Vision), imprecise scent with a range of 30 feet, y the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

entries.name: Feybound
entries.description:
You have spent time in the First World or another realm of the fey y aren't entirely the same person you were before. Perhaps you made a purchase at the legendary Witchmarket or partook deeply of fey food y wine. Whatever the case, willingly or inadvertently, you made a bargain with the fey, the benefits of which come at a price.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

You are trained in Fey Lore y gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.TMBXArwICQRJdwT6]{Fey's Fortune}free action. You must follow some rule or limitation as part of your pact with the fey. If you violate the rule, you lose Fey's Fortune until you receive the effects of a successful @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual using Naturaleza. The exact limitation is up to you y the GM, but the most common requirement is that you must fulfill a single request from any fey who knows your name.

entries.name: Médico de campaña
entries.description:
En el caótico ajetreo de la batalla, aprendiste a adaptarte a condiciones rápidamente cambiantes mientras atendías a las bajas. Apañaste a soldados, guardias u otros combatientes, y aprendiste bastante acerca de la logística de la guerra.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Medicina de guerra}.

entries.name: Finadar Leshy
entries.description:
Prerequisites Leshy ancestry

You are a leshy from Finadar Forest, originally created under the corruption of a cyclopean monolith. Though the Pathfinder Society managed to sever the monolith's connection, freeing the forest y your people from its influence, you retain a trace, unnerving connection to the Abyss.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y the Abyssal Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Mirada intimidante}.

entries.name: Final Blade Survivor
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

You fell prey to the whims of the Galtan mob y were scheduled for execution by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.5Q5MfHX43Sjm8C6Z]{Final Blade}, but through skill-or sheer luck-you managed to talk your way out of it.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Carisma o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y the Revolution Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Mentiroso encantador}.

entries.name: Fireworks Performer
entries.description:
Few celebrations in Tian-Xia are complete without a show of fireworks, y your job is to make sure they go off without a hitch. You load the fireworks, set the fuses, y choreograph the performance, bringing the show together in a finale of lights y explosions. Then it's time to pack up your gear y move on to the next civic holiday or religious festival. Of course, someone who travels the roads with a pack full of high explosives is bound to run into an adventure or two along the way, y so over time, your fireworks have been spent in support of that life.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7LB00jkh6JaJr3vS]{Interpretación fascinante}.

entries.name: Fogfen Tale-Teller
entries.description:
You know there are monstrous things out in the swamp known as Fogfen; you've seen these things through the mist, gliding through the murky water y heaving themselves over sodden bits of ly. No one in Otari believes your tales of swamp monsters from the depths, even when you embellish the creatures of your stories with fangs, wings, or tentacles. You'll just have to prove to them that there are truly monsters out there, y that they were wrong to doubt you.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Athletics y the Swamp Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler}.

entries.name: Former Aspis Agent
entries.description:
For more than a century, the Pathfinder Society has clashed with the avaricious y underhyed Aspis Consortium, y several years ago the Society dealt its rival a decisive blow. You may be one of the few survivors of a doomed Aspis expedition, or perhaps you chafed at the Consortium's villainous practices y defected to the Pathfinders. No matter your reasons, you know how to be efficient y ruthless when the circumstances demy.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y the Aspis Consortium Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Intimidación de grupo}skill feat. You gain access to any uncommon options as though you were a member of the Aspis Consortium.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 7 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Adivino
entries.description:
Las hebras del Destino son claras para ti, puesto que has aprendido muchas de las formas tradicionales por las que los laicos pueden adivinar el futuro. Podrías haber utilizado dichas habilidades para guiar a tu comunidad o simplemente para ganar dinero. Pero incluso el más leve atisbo de estas prácticas te conecta con los misterios ocultos del Universo.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y Saber de la adivinación. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Identificar extrañezas}.

entries.name: Framed in Ferrous Quarter
entries.description:
Everyone knows that Ferrous Quarter isn't exactly the nicest part of Alkenstar. Hard-working laborers, gunsmiths suffering from black lung, y red-eyed tinkerers alike can toil their entire lives on these grimy streets y still wind up dead in an alley with nothing to show for it. You were once one of these humble artisans, until one day, out of nowhere, things broke bad.

Maybe you hung out with the wrong crowd. Maybe it was just bad luck. Whatever the case, you were framed for a crime you didn't commit-larceny, smuggling, possibly even murder. You didn't stick around long enough to find out what, exactly, the shieldmarshals banging on your door were charging you with. Now, you're on the lam, uncertain where you'll be able to get a good night's sleep, let alone your next meal.

At least one thing's for sure, though: before you turned heel y ran into the streets, you saw a telltale signature on the arrest warrant. It was the scrawl of a corrupt shieldmarshal who's framed countless other hardworking folks in your neighborhood on the basis of cooked-up evidence. Yes, you're sure of it-the crooked guard who took you down is none other than Deputy Anjelique Loveless, y you're determined to return the favor.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Especialidad artesana}.

entries.name: Freed Slave of Absalom
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom y Starstone Isle

As a recently freed slave in Absalom, you belong to a new, close-knit social class at the heart of the city's most important trades.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Absalom Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Callejeo}.

entries.name: Jugador
entries.description:
La excitación de ganar te atrae a los juegos de azar. Podría haberse tratado de un negocio secundario pero lucrativo que palideció en comparación con los riesgos reales de las aventuras, o bien podrías haber pasado momentos difíciles debido al juego y haberte dedicado a las aventuras como forma de salir de dicha espiral.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y Saber del juego. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Miénteme}.

entries.name: Geb Crusader
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lys

You grew up considering the existence of the undead nation of Geb an atrocity y trained to one day take part in destroying it y putting its vile inhabitants to their final rest. Key to your preparations is a thorough study of Pharasma, Urgathoa, y other undead-related deities y their philosophies.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y the Undead Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x7EMZNMavris2aHY]{Alumno del canon}.

entries.name: Genie-Blessed
entries.description:
You've sought out a powerful genie y requested their blessing, hoping to increase your fortune. Your wish was vague, but fortune y the genie favored you with a more powerful effect than an ordinary wish, granting you bits of wish-twisted luck throughout the rest of your life.
