Meanwhile, other genies of the same kind recognize you as one blessed by one of their most powerful nobles, y might treat you with greater respect or envy.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Genie Lore skill. You gain the Wish for Luck free action.

Note: You must add the Wish for Luck free action

entries.name: Gladiador
entries.description:
Los sangrientos juegos de la arena te enseñaron el arte del combate. Antes de llegar a la verdadera fama te marchaste (o huiste) de la arena para explorar el mundo. Tu habilidad en hacer manar la sangre y en atraer la atención de una multitud te resultan muy útiles en tu nueva vida de aventuras.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y Saber de los gladiadores. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{Interpretación impresionante}.

entries.name: Goblinblood Orphan
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Old Cheliax

Your family, whether goblin, hobgoblin, or human, died in the Goblinblood Wars. Though you were marked by these losses, you managed to survive through your own resilience y resourcefulness.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Goblin Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}skill feat with Survival.

entries.name: Godless Graycloak
entries.description:
You were a member of a church once, y you saw some things among Absalom's religious elite that put you off piety for good. Maybe it was one too many beggars turned away at the temple's front door, or maybe it was a high-ranking priests consistent abuses of power. What got to you most, though, was that according to just about every belief system out there, sinners y saints, priests y paupers were all alike in one key way: they never saw retribution or accolades until buried 6 feet under. You wanted more from Absalom. You wanted more from the world. You wanted justice now, on this plane, not in some indeterminate afterlife. So you left the church y wyered the city, a ghost of your former self.

You finally found a like mind in Captain Runewulf, "the Unbeliever," whose reputation y similar distaste for religion inspired you to join the Graycloaks. As a sworn protector of the Ascendant Court, you didn't differentiate between Sarenites or Pharasmins, Iomedaeans or Norgorberites; if you saw someone in danger, you put your life on the line to save them, whatever their place within or outside a church.

Your good record has earned you a transfer-temporary or not, the choice is yours-to the newly formed Edgewatch, where you'll use your authority to guard the lives of not just Absalomians, but all who have come to your gry city to experience its wonders. Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y your choice of a specific religion Lore skill (such as Iomedae Lore or Norgorber Lore).

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}with Graycloaks, priests, y clerics. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification}feat.

entries.name: Goldhy Arms Dealer
entries.description:
You're a dwarven agent of the Goldhy Lodge, a collection of dwarven merchants based out of Dongun Hold who seeks to sell guns far y wide. High King Anong Arunak hasn't expressed approval for such a method of distribution yet, but in the meantime you're still out y about, talking up your wares y occasionally providing visceral demonstrations of the overwhelming stopping power of your firearms. These demonstrations y sales have given you a taste for adventure, y the constant threat of piracy has convinced you of the importance of adventuring with a group.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacy y Mercantile Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Impresión de grupo}.

entries.name: Gry Council Bureaucrat
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom y Starstone Isle

You spent years working as a clerk to a functionary in Absalom's government. Your service taught you a thing or two about rousing speeches y manipulating the city's bureaucracy.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Carisma o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Government Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Impresión de grupo}.

entries.name: Grave Robber
entries.description:
Resurrectionist. Body snatcher. No matter what you're called, you know where the bodies are buried, y how many coins they'll fetch when dug up. Adventuring comes naturally to you-in your mind dungeons are just oversized tombs-as does returning home with your loot undetected.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t3btih0O5RUwWynt]{Contrabandista experto}.

entries.name: Grizzled Muckrucker
entries.description:
You've served on the Muckruckers, the unofficial guards of the flooded Puddles district. The pay's no good, the conditions are squalid, y you've seen things during your time on the force that've made you question your career entirely. Perhaps you joined the group out of a sense of duty to your fellow Absalomians, or maybe you felt an obligation to help restore your apocalyptic home district to some semblance of normalcy. Either way, the traumas you've endured, the double-crossers who've betrayed you, the wretched monsters that have crawled out of the muck to assail you-it's enough to turn an officer to weary cynicism or self-destruction through merciful drink.

Thankfully, you found an out: an invitation to transfer to the newly formed Edgewatch. You accepted the offer in the hope that some fresh experience in a new district, surrounded by new people, might reignite the hope y passion you felt for the job so long ago.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia, as well as either Labor Lore or Underworld Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}with Muckruckers, mercenaries, y adventurers. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.urQZwmzg2kS53vd5]{Rastrador experto}.

entries.name: Guardia
entries.description:
Serviste en la guardia, bien por patriotismo o bien por la necesidad de ganarte la vida. De una forma o de otra, sabes hacer hablar a un sospechoso difícil. Dejaras la guardia por el motivo que la dejaras, podrías pensar que las aventuras son una forma de utilizar tus aptitudes en un escenario mayor.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación, y Saber legal o Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ar2DUlvDK4LDcH9J]{Coacción rápida}.

entries.name: Gunsmith
entries.description:
From a young age, you apprenticed to an experienced gunsmith y over time your skill y knowledge rose to match that of your master. Today, you can easily repair, modify, or improve nearly any firearm you've seen before, y even if you haven't seen it, you'll break it down to learn about what makes it tick in no time. You've taken those skills on the road, using them to assist yourself y your allies as an adventurer when it comes to maintaining their weapons, shields, armor, y more.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One of these boosts must be to Inteligencia o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ASy9AKEIRxPYUi5o]{Quick Repair}.

entries.name: Harbor Guard Moonlighter
entries.description:
The Harbor Guard isn't known for being the most honorable precinct in town. A few years after you joined the force, you became disillusioned by the rampant corruption within the precinct y the district at large. One night, you stumbled on an ad for a local monster hunter's guild. You joined on a whim, but fell in love with the swashbuckling lifestyle of an independent bounty hunter. You've since earned quite a reputation for your nocturnal adventures; everyone still knows that you're a Harbor Guard, but stories of your dungeon-delving adventures have long overshadowed that facet of your life. Unfortunately, long nights of monster-hunting have negatively impacted your performance at your day job, so maybe it wasn't a surprise when your supervising officer put in a transfer request for you, spelling the end of your plucky nighttime antics with that particular guild.

Despite the decline in your performance, Lieutenant Lavarsus of Edgewatch sees potential (y even, maybe, a bit of himself) in you. You're eager to be on a new unit y for the chance to bring your monster-hunting skills to a district that has been plagued by such supernatural beasts for far too long.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y your choice of Sailing Lore or Hunting Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}with Harbor Guards, ship captains, y freelance adventurers. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq]{Salto rápido}.

entries.name: Harrow-Led (Occultism)
entries.description:
You were the subject of a harrow reading at a pivotal point in your life, such as on an important birthday, or upon reaching adulthood. The reading was eerily accurate y has been relevant, for good or ill, at more points in your life than you could call mere coincidence.

Ryomly determine two harrow suits tied to your character, each reflecting a specific ability score. You can do so by drawing cards from a harrow deck or by rolling a [[/r 1d6]]{d6}:

d6 Result Ability
1 Hammers Strength
2 Keys Dexterity
3 Shields Constitution
4 Books Inteligencia
5 Stars Sabiduria
6 Crowns Carisma

The first suit is your aligned score, y the second suit is your misaligned score.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One must be to your aligned or misaligned score, y one is a free ability boost. Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y the Harrow Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Harrow-Led (Performance)
entries.description:
You were the subject of a harrow reading at a pivotal point in your life, such as on an important birthday, or upon reaching adulthood. The reading was eerily accurate y has been relevant, for good or ill, at more points in your life than you could call mere coincidence.

Ryomly determine two harrow suits tied to your character, each reflecting a specific ability score. You can do so by drawing cards from a harrow deck or by rolling a [[/r 1d6]]{d6}:

d6 Result Ability
1 Hammers Strength
2 Keys Dexterity
3 Shields Constitution
4 Books Inteligencia
5 Stars Sabiduria
6 Crowns Carisma

The first suit is your aligned score, y the second suit is your misaligned score.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One must be to your aligned or misaligned score, y one is a free ability boost. Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y the Harrow Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Harrow-Led (Society)
entries.description:
You were the subject of a harrow reading at a pivotal point in your life, such as on an important birthday, or upon reaching adulthood. The reading was eerily accurate y has been relevant, for good or ill, at more points in your life than you could call mere coincidence.

Ryomly determine two harrow suits tied to your character, each reflecting a specific ability score. You can do so by drawing cards from a harrow deck or by rolling a [[/r 1d6]]{d6}:

d6 Result Ability
1 Hammers Strength
2 Keys Dexterity
3 Shields Constitution
4 Books Inteligencia
5 Stars Sabiduria
6 Crowns Carisma

The first suit is your aligned score, y the second suit is your misaligned score.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One must be to your aligned or misaligned score, y one is a free ability boost. Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Harrow Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Haunted
entries.description:
You are followed by a spirit or entity, either from childhood or since a traumatic or momentous event. You may have seen this entity. Others may have seen it as well. You have studied esoteric subjects trying to understy your situation, but this presence in your life remains a mystery. Whatever this entity is or wants, it influences your life in subtle ways, not always good. Sometimes the entity helps you, but at other times, its influence is malevolent or harmful. The entity is most likely to surface in stressful situations.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

You are trained in Occultism y an additional skill in which the haunting entity is well-versed, determined by the GM. Any time you attempt a skill check for the entity's skill, the GM can offer you a +1 circumstance bonus to the check, as though the entity were @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aiding}you. If you accept but fail the check, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}(@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4}on a critical failure). The initial Frightened value can't be reduced by effects that would reduce or prevent the condition (such as a fighter's bravery).

entries.name: Haunted Citizen
entries.description:
You grew up in a region where undead lurk everywhere. This could be a domain as small as a vampire's fief or as vast as the nation of Ustalav. As an ever-present concern, the undead greatly shaped your life. Living with fear became an everyday skill... as did pleading for your life.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Lore skill for your home settlement. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6ON8DjFXSMITZleX]{No Cause for Alarm}.

entries.name: Haunting Vision
entries.description:
You've been haunted by frightening dreams of fires your whole life. This could be the result of a past, near-death experience with fire or it might have no obvious source that you know of. Recently, you stumbled upon an image, story, or other omen featuring the dragon god of destruction, Dahak, y you were struck with an unnerving sense of deja vu-you've come to think that the draconic deity might have something to do with your dreams, y as such have been studying all you can about the god. Your visions have bolstered your faith as well; even if you don't worship a specific deity, you have a deep passion for matters of faith.

Your latest dream, for the first time, had enough details to identify its setting-in this last dream, you saw the town of Breachill burning. You've decided to join the Call for Heroes hoping to save the town you fear might burn to the ground soon.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y the Dahak Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x7EMZNMavris2aHY]{Alumno del canon}.

entries.name: Hellknight Historian
entries.description:
The various Hellknight Orders intrigue you, whether you seek to become one of their number yourself, wish to oppose their goals at every turn, or are merely inspired by or curious to learn more about them. You've heard that when the Order of the Nail abyoned Citadel Altaerein, they left behind the deed to the castle so anyone brave enough to explore the ruins y the defenses no doubt left behind would be rewarded with ownership of the abyoned fortress.

You decided to join the Call for Heroes to hoping to gain an opportunity to explore Citadel Altaerein.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Architecture Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JtjnFsOToBLnSRO9]{Gracia cortesana}.

entries.name: Herbolario
entries.description:
Como boticario formalmente entrenado o practicante rural de la medicina popular, has aprendido las propiedades curativas de las diversas hierbas. Estás acostumbrado a recolectar las curas naturales adecuadas en todo tipo de entorno y prepararlas correctamente.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y Saber del herbolario. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WC4xLBGmBsdOdHWu]{Medicina natural}.

entries.name: Hermean Expatriate
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

You have been exiled from Hermea, perhaps of your own accord or perhaps because you didn't measure up. However, you take with you some of the benefits of the excellent education afforded to its citizenry.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Dragon Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P6icK2DbRoZ3H6kc]{Skill Training}.

entries.name: Hermean Heritor
entries.description:
[Legacy - Age of Ashes]

With the restrictions on Hermean citizenship lifted, you may have fled the city of Promise or have spent some of your childhood in the company of someone who did.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber legal. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingüe}skill feat or the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}skill feat for Society.

entries.name: Ermitaño (Naturaleza)
entries.description:
En un lugar aislado (una cueva, un oasis remoto o una mansión solitaria) llevaste una vida de soledad. La aventura podría representar tu primera incursión en mucho tiempo entre el resto de las personas. Podría ser un respiro bienvenido de la soledad o un cambio no voluntario pero, en uno u otro caso, lo más probable es que seas muy poco sofisticado.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza u Ocultismo, más una habilidad de Saber relacionada con el terreno en el que vivías como ermitaño (por ejemplo, Saber de las cavernas o Saber del desierto). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Ermitaño (Ocultismo)
entries.description:
En un lugar aislado (una cueva, un oasis remoto o una mansión solitaria) llevaste una vida de soledad. La aventura podría representar tu primera incursión en mucho tiempo entre el resto de las personas. Podría ser un respiro bienvenido de la soledad o un cambio no voluntario pero, en uno u otro caso, lo más probable es que seas muy poco sofisticado.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo, más una habilidad de Saber relacionada con el terreno en el que vivías como ermitaño (por ejemplo, Saber de las cavernas o Saber del desierto). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Hired Killer
entries.description:
Your life truly began after your first kill. Maybe you killed in self-defense, maybe it was a crime of passion, or maybe it was just an accident y you were a kid in the wrong place at the wrong time. In the end, the why doesn't matter. You got away with it. y then you found that maybe it didn't bother you as much as it should have. y maybe, just maybe, you had a talent you could use to forge a life for yourself. A blood-soaked talent y a blood-soaked life, sure. But it's yours.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One boost must be to Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.beyw5bdA5hkQbmaG]{Terrain Stalker}skill feat, choosing a terrain appropriate for where you make your kills.

entries.name: Hookclaw Digger
entries.description:
Prerequisites Kobold ancestry

You are a digger from the Hookclaw kobold tribe, born beneath the streets of Absalom, with muscles y mind hardened by years spent tunneling through rock y earth y a confidence built upon your pride in your draconic heritage.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía, Saber de la minería, y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3HChkcD1IRqv4DbA]{Improvise Tool}.

entries.name: Hounded Thief
entries.description:
Some time ago, you stole a unique item from a strange individual. It might have been a piece of clockwork from a far-off ly or some other bit of strange technology. You might still have it or you might have sold it, but either way, you can't shake the feeling that you're being followed y watched, likely by forces who want to retrieve what you took. Luckily, a life of adventure keeps you on the move.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Latrocinio y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jDdOqFmZLwE4dblQ]{Carterista}.

entries.name: Cazador
entries.description:
Has perseguido y abatido animales y otras criaturas de las tierras vírgenes. Despellejar animales, preparar su piel para la venta y cocinar su carne formaron también parte de tu aprendizaje, todo lo cual te puede proporcionar recursos útiles al ir de aventuras.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y Saber de la curtición. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tGIXuk0XeWmG04CX]{Supervisor de la fauna}.

entries.name: Inexplicably Expelled
entries.description:
Gaining admission to Blythir College is a difficult task, even for Alkenstar's most well-to-do families. In the magic-warped Mana Wastes, it's next to impossible to fake arcane talents or alchemical aptitude. So when you were accepted to the school, it was one of the most triumphant moments of your life.

Unfortunately, your victory was short-lived. Just as you were you making significant headway on a promising series of explosive experiments, you found a letter on your desk informing you that, effective immediately, you were permanently expelled from Blythir College. As bogus as the punishment was, the charges leveled against you were even more puzzling: theft of property, both intellectual y physical. y just like that, you found your prestigious honors replaced with a ruined reputation, y your colleagues y mentors became bitter rivals y accusers. In an instant, you'd gone from promising scholar to wanted criminal.

You followed the money for answers y learned that a shady financier named Ambrost Mugly didn't want you to finish your research at Blythir. He'd learned that you were on the brink of a great discovery-one that even you weren't fully aware of-y he decided that your imminent breakthrough would be bad for business. Unfortunately for Mugly, he chose the wrong student to destroy. Now, you'll do whatever's necessary to get your revenge on the villain who stole the future you had worked so hard to build for yourself.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Academia Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting}.

entries.name: Inlyer
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom y Starstone Isle

You grew up in an untamed region of the Isle of Kortos, y you know how to survive in the wild.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y a Lore skill related to the terrain type associated with your home region (such as Hills Lore or Mountains Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tGIXuk0XeWmG04CX]{Survey Wildlife}.

entries.name: Insurgent
entries.description:
You were more than a rebel; you were a revolutionary, fighting for the promise of a new or better country. You may or may not still believe in the cause, or perhaps victory or exile has led you on this new journey to trumpet your glory... or to escape the consequences of your defeat.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HEBXaS656MZTiWFu]{Lengthy Diversion}.

entries.name: Iolite Trainee Hobgoblin
entries.description:
Prerequisites Hobgoblin Ancestry

The Iolite Squad was Oprak's first foray into training hobgoblins for Pathfinder membership. You've added the archival y archaeological skills they sent back to Oprak into your military training.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aAoFc10cOpxGypOY]{Sign Language}.

entries.name: Issian Partisan
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lys

You grew up among the northern houses of Brevoy in old Issia. Steeped in the cultural legacy of pirates y smugglers, you rely on your cleverness y charm as you make your way throughout the world.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Mentiroso encantador}.

entries.name: Junk Collector
entries.description:
You live by the adage that one person's trash is another's treasure. Whether by sifting through scrap heaps or digging up old battlefields, you remain on the lookout for lost or discarded objects that you might be able to turn into something useful. More often than not, what you find is just junk... but you're convinced that one of these days, you're going to hit the jackpot. You've even taken up adventuring as a means to supercharge your access to all sorts of junk, gear, y loot.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y your choice of either the Engineering Lore or Mining Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.voYr7ygVcWmlg1f4]{Crafter's Appraisal}.

entries.name: Junker
entries.description:
You live on the outskirts of civilization, combing through the detritus left behind for interesting trinkets to sell or use in your own crafting. Though you have a preferred terrain to search, you know that the greatest treasures occur where people make greater use of technology.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Lore skill of the terrain in which you scavenge. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C0Tcelg3BAPhML6J]{Porteador recio}.

entries.name: Kalistrade Follower
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

You follow the philosophy of the Prophecies of Kalistrade, seeking to build up your wealth in this life so that you might meet the next world on your own terms.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Kalistrade Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5nc5ridFBfYpn2Om]{Buscador de gangas}.

entries.name: Kyonin Emissary
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

You were trained to be an ambassador of the elven ly of Kyonin, y you have now been sent out into the wider world to build alliances between Kyonin y the neighboring kingdoms.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Carisma o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Politics Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingüe}.

entries.name: Bracero
entries.description:
Has pasado años llevando a cabo trabajos físicos arduos. Era una vida difícil, pero de alguna forma sobreviviste. Puedes haber abrazado las aventuras como forma más fácil de abrirte camino o te podrías aventurar a las órdenes de otro.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerz o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y Saber del trabajo manual. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C0Tcelg3BAPhML6J]{Porteador recio}.

entries.name: Lastwall Survivor
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

You managed to escape the devastation that the Whispering Tyrant brought to your nation, but you lost everything to the lich-king's minions, including your home y many friends y family.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y the Undead Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Medicina de guerra}.

entries.name: Learned Guard Prodigy (Arcana)
entries.description:
For some, the nuts y bolts of keeping the peace are practically second nature. Such is the case for you, a member of the Learned Guard with an incredible mind for investigation as well as a gift for understying magic. You probably aren't a hit with your peers, who find your intellect y natural gift of deduction perhaps a bit off-putting, but when left to your own devices you excel, y you get along well with professors y mages such as those who work in Forae Logos or the Arcanamirium.

After no shortage of debating the pros y cons, you decided to transfer to the Edgewatch precinct. Sure, you have a keen understying of the theories y principles behind law enforcement, but you've reasoned that in order to be a truly effective guard you'll need some first-hy experience in a high-risk area nabbing suspects y protecting innocents-all the while taking fastidious notes y writing your gry thesis on the merits y shortcomings of Absalom's laws.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill, as well as Legal Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}with Learned Guards y with academics such as librarians y scholars. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Learned Guard Prodigy (Occultism)
entries.description:
For some, the nuts y bolts of keeping the peace are practically second nature. Such is the case for you, a member of the Learned Guard with an incredible mind for investigation as well as a gift for understying magic. You probably aren't a hit with your peers, who find your intellect y natural gift of deduction perhaps a bit off-putting, but when left to your own devices you excel, y you get along well with professors y mages such as those who work in Forae Logos or the Arcanamirium.

After no shortage of debating the pros y cons, you decided to transfer to the Edgewatch precinct. Sure, you have a keen understying of the theories y principles behind law enforcement, but you've reasoned that in order to be a truly effective guard you'll need some first-hy experience in a high-risk area nabbing suspects y protecting innocents-all the while taking fastidious notes y writing your gry thesis on the merits y shortcomings of Absalom's laws.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo, as well as Legal Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}with Learned Guards y with academics such as librarians y scholars. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Legendary Parents
entries.description:
[Legacy - Age of Ashes]

One or more of your parents (either biological or adoptive) were heroes of the Age of Ashes Adventure Path. Others tend to treat you with a bit more respect, or perhaps fear your connections to people of great power.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación, y the Genealogy Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Intimidación de grupo}.

entries.name: Lesser Scion
entries.description:
You are the youngest child in a noble house (in Cheliax, Isger, or yoran) y sty to inherit nothing from your family. Although you have a minor title, it affords you no lys or wealth, but it has garnered you a small amount of respect y deference in your travels. When play begins, you are riding in a caravan bound for Almas, where a cousin has promised to allow you to stay with them for a month.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Heraldry Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Confraternización}.

entries.name: Local Scion
entries.description:
You're from Breachill y have lived there most, if not all, of your life. You might be the son or daughter of a well-known local adventuring family, or a family with a storied tradition of military or other martial service. You likely also have some sort of skill with your hys, as the people of Breachill are very self-sufficient.

The Call for Heroes is one of your hometown's most iconic traditions, y you want to attend so you can prove your own merits to the council-beyond simply those of your family's name.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Breachill Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Especialidad artesana}.

entries.name: Lost y Alone
entries.description:
You were training to become a knight in Lastwall when the Whispering Tyrant escaped his imprisonment y destroyed the nation. It was only by dumb luck that you are alive at all, but the memories of that fateful day haunt your dreams. When play begins, you have boarded a caravan heading toward a new town, having worn out your welcome at the taverns y inns of Elidir.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación, y Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Mirada intimidante}.

entries.name: Lumber Consortium Laborer
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

You have suffered as a worker for the unscrupulous Lumber Consortium, laboring under harsh conditions in dangerous wooded regions of yoran.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Forest Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}skill feat with Athletics.

entries.name: Magaambya Academic (Arcana)
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

You studied magic at the prestigious Magaambya academy in Nantambu, learning magical traditions dating back to Old-Mage Jatembe y earning a pedigree respected by magical scholars almost everywhere.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill, as well as the Academia Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Magaambya Academic (Nature)
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

You studied magic at the prestigious Magaambya academy in Nantambu, learning magical traditions dating back to Old-Mage Jatembe y earning a pedigree respected by magical scholars almost everywhere.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza, as well as the Academia Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Magical Experiment
entries.description:
At some point in your life, powerful people performed magical experiments on you that changed you permanently. You may have signed up for this voluntarily, but it may have been against your will. You still bear the marks, as well as the abilities.

You gain one ability boost. It must be to Constitution.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Occultism y the Academia Lore skill. You gain one special ability as a result of the magical experimentation. Work with the GM to select an appropriate ability from the following list or to come up with another special ability.

  • Enhanced Senses You gain low-light vision (or darkvision if you already had low-light vision) y an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet, such as scent, thoughtsense, tremorsense, or wavesense.
  • Resistant Skin The experiments rendered your skin tougher y resilient to a particular type of damage. You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum resistance 1) against two of the following types of energy damage, one chosen by you y the other chosen by the GM: acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic.
  • Touch Telepathy The experiments to your body allowed you to link minds via touch. You gain telepathy with creatures as long as you are in physical contact. This allows you to communicate mentally with any creatures you're in physical contact with, as long as you both share a language. This doesn't give any special access to their thoughts, y communicates no more information than normal speech would.

entries.name: Magical Merchant
entries.description:
Selling magic items isn't like being an ordinary merchant. The wares you buy y sell are expensive, making each sale rare y lucrative. You've developed knowledge of expert hyiwork to ensure you don't fall for a scam, since buying a single counterfeit item can lead to bankruptcy. Whether you went out of business y had to find alternative employment, or took up adventuring to acquire new merchyise, you've taken to adventuring yourself.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Crafting y Mercantile Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.voYr7ygVcWmlg1f4]{Crafter's Appraisal}.

entries.name: Magical Misfit
entries.description:
You don't understy folks who claim that magical talent is some sort of burden or great responsibility; you've always used your magic to cause trouble y to escape the consequences. Whether becoming an adventurer is your attempt to make amends or just a new way to make some mischief, you're excited to see where it takes you, y you still delight in using your skills to get out of trouble.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Arcana y Underworld Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uR62fVC9FyQAMCO1]{Trick Magic Item}.

entries.name: Mammoth Herder
entries.description:
You're adept at calming, wrangling, y living beside woolly mammoths y other megafauna commonly found in the Realm of the Mammoth Lords. Perhaps you've even formed a particularly strong bond with one or two of your following's animals, y you tend to get along with other herders in the following, such as young Imek or old Chultei. When the Broken Tusk following must move, you y the other herders know how to convey this message to the animals in your herd.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y the Herding Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nowEaHgIyij7im8F]{Adiestrar animal}.

entries.name: Mammoth Speaker
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lys

You have learned the secrets of taming the mighty mammoths y other megafauna of the far north. Perhaps these talents are a part of your people's traditional customs, or perhaps you sought out these massive animals of your own accord.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y the Animal Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nowEaHgIyij7im8F]{Adiestrar animal}.

entries.name: Mana Wastes Refugee
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lys

Exposure to the corrupting influence of the Mana Wastes' strange energies has warped your inner essence, resulting in unpredictable interactions with magic items y more than a little know-how about surviving under bizarre y adverse natural conditions.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y the Wilderness Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uR62fVC9FyQAMCO1]{Trick Magic Item}.

entries.name: Mantis Scion
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

At least one of your parents is a member of the notorious Red Mantis assassins, merciless killers for hire who rarely fail to claim their marks. Whether on purpose or by simple exposure, you were trained from a young age in the art of stalking y killing people.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y the Assassin Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}skill feat with Stealth.

entries.name: Market Runner
entries.description:
Keeleno Lathenar, the proprietor of Otari Market, is a grim y bitter man. A werewolf named Jaul Mezmin mauled his wife, Ayla, to death 30 years ago. Keeleno has never forgotten nor forgiven this attack, y he believes against all odds that Jaul has evaded justice y is alive y well. Running errys for Keeleno around town, you've gotten to know him almost as well as you know Otari. Keeleno's suspicions have rubbed off

on you a bit, so you keep a wary eye on other people—particularly around the full moon.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Otari Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Confraternización}.

entries.name: Martial Disciple (Acrobatics)
entries.description:
Te has dedicado a un entrenamiento intenso y a un estudio riguroso para convertirte en un gran guerrero. La escuela a la que asististe puede haber sido un monasterio tradicionalista, una academia militar de élite o la rama local de una prestigiosa organización mercenaria.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Acrobacias y Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Caída de gato}.

entries.name: Martial Disciple (Athletics)
entries.description:
Te has dedicado a un entrenamiento intenso y a un estudio riguroso para convertirte en un gran guerrero. La escuela a la que asististe puede haber sido un monasterio tradicionalista, una academia militar de élite o la rama local de una prestigiosa organización mercenaria.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq]{Salto rápido}.

entries.name: Mechanic
entries.description:
The intricate inner workings of machines are no stranger to you. Whether they are mundane devices or complex clockworks, you know what makes them tick y how to maintain them. An adventuring group might keep you around to repair their equipment, or you might travel around to offer your rare services to those in need-for a price, of course!

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ASy9AKEIRxPYUi5o]{Quick Repair}.

entries.name: Mechanical Symbiosis
entries.description:
Whether you purposefully took it on or had it thrust upon you, a bronze, clockwork object latched onto some part of your body. It may have sunk its needles into you or locked its spidery legs around your neck, torso, or upper arm. Some entity or spirit lives in this collection of gears y wires-whether or not other people hear its whispers is up to you. The entity may be an ancient, terrible being that has razed villages with its hosts, or it may be a brilliant, starry-eyed child who barely understys you're not part of its own body.

You have studied y searched for information on these rare, crab-like machines, leaving you an expert in the binding of elemental spirits or mortal souls to mechanical objects. Though you have several theories on what the symbiotic entity might be, you have no definitive answers-this may be why you're adventuring in the first place, or perhaps you've made a deal with someone to get it removed. The entity might talk to you periodically, or it might only speak when it wants you to do something in particular or finds the two of you in danger. You y the GM should decide on the entity's motivations, or if the motivations should be a secret known only to the GM.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y an additional skill in which the clockwork entity is well-versed, determined by the GM. Any time you attempt a skill check for the entity's skill, the GM can offer you a +1 circumstance bonus to the check, as though the entity were Aiding you. If you accept but fail the check, the entity clenches up y you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}(@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}on a critical failure).

entries.name: Medicinal Clocksmith
entries.description:
While others might have looked to clockwork as a mechanical innovation, you see the potential in the technology to improve the health of patients. You might be an experienced field medic who reached for a scrapped construct to help a wounded soldier, or a vanguard surgeon who's found replacing organs with clockwork more effective than repairing them. Perhaps you've also worked to "optimize" organic bodies with fine machinery, with or without the permission of your patients.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bkZgWFSFV4cAf5Ot]{Cirugía arriesgada}.

entries.name: Megafauna Hunter
entries.description:
Life is only as meaningful as its risks, y the risks you're willing to take are big indeed. Like Wipa's half-sister Panuaku, Mammoth Lord Merthig, y Eiwa's great-grynephew Pakano, you revel in the thrill of the hunt, especially when it involves mortal combat with megafauna, dinosaurs, y other oversized beasts. Though you're still early in your hunting career, your talent shows great promise, y you have a natural knack for tracking y taking down big game such as moose, saber-toothed tigers, y even wild mammoths.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Hunting Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler}.

entries.name: Menagerie Dung Sweeper
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom y Starstone Isle

Whether you washed warrior beasts below the Irorium's arena floor or tended to the mutated animals of a Puddle sideshow, you are experienced with all manner of weird wildlife.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y the Animal Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nowEaHgIyij7im8F]{Adiestrar animal}.

entries.name: Merabite Prodigy
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

Even in a city renowned for its alchemy, you were able to rise above the competition.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Alchemical Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Especialidad artesana}skill feat with alchemy

entries.name: Mercader
entries.description:
Despachabas mercancías a cambio de dinero (o las intercambiabas) en una tienda polvorienta, puesto de mercado o caravana de mercaderes. Las habilidades que aprendiste se siguen aplicando en la vida de aventurero, donde haber conseguido un buen trato en una armadura podría prevenir tu muerte.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y Saber mercantil. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5nc5ridFBfYpn2Om]{Buscador de gangas}.

entries.name: Minero
entries.description:
Te ganaste la vida arrancando minerales preciosos de las profundidades sin luz de la tierra. Las aventuras pueden haberte parecido lucrativas o sofisticadas, comparadas con tan agotadora tarea, y si tienes que volver a las profundidades, esta vez piensas hacerlo empuñando un arma de verdad en lugar de un pico de minero.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y Saber de la minería. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Competencia en un terreno} con el terreno subterráneo.

entries.name: Missionary
entries.description:
You received training from clergy in a faraway temple, who sent you out into the world to spread the faith. Although you are relatively new at this, you are always on the lookout for new places in need of your deity's teachings y guidance. When play begins, you are riding along in a caravan making your way through sparsely populated regions of Isger, spreading the news of your faith to those who will listen.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y Saber de la escritura. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Impresión de grupo}.

entries.name: Molthuni Mercenary
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

Whether you sought citizenship or simply needed a steady paycheck, you spent some of your time as a paid mercenary in the armed forces of Molthune, where you fought against Molthune's enemies such as Nirmathas or the Ironfang Legion. Alternatively, you might have worked at sea, protecting Molthune's military y trading ships against pirates on Lake Encarthan.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Mercenary Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{Experienced Professional}.

entries.name: Musical Prodigy
entries.description:
Ever since you were young, you've been almost supernaturally skilled in a particular type of music. The people around you were sure you'd grow up to perform at royal courts or to become a world-famous composer, but you've chosen a life of adventure instead. You might have given up on those dreams to find your own meaning, or you might find that adventuring allows you to experience unfiltered emotions y exploits that you can translate into a wondrous symphony some day.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Performance y Music Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lFwfUvH2708rl6i3]{Virtuosic Performer}.

Note: You will have to select the correct virtuosic performer feat for your style.

entries.name: Mystic Seer
entries.description:
You delight crowds by reading minds, telling futures, y contacting spirits. Although much of your work is misdirection y showmanship, your cons have inadvertently awakened a genuine awareness of magic in your mind. This new sense is both thrilling y frightening, y you hope that you can hone it further in the Circus of Wayward Wonders.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y the Scam Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blMeVamjGz4ODWxq]{Arcane Sense}.

entries.name: Mystic Tutor (Arcana)
entries.description:
You spent years predicting, identifying, y harnessing the innate magical talents of those around you. A magic-rich world has taught you that you can never have too much training when everyone around you is capable of magic.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One must be Inteligencia o Sabiduria y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Your innate magical trait is arcane. Estás entrenado en las habilidades Arcana, depending on your innate magical trait, y the Academia Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Mystic Tutor (Occultism)
entries.description:
You spent years predicting, identifying, y harnessing the innate magical talents of those around you. A magic-rich world has taught you that you can never have too much training when everyone around you is capable of magic.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One must be Inteligencia o Sabiduria y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Your innate magical trait is occult. Estás entrenado en las habilidades Occultism, depending on your innate magical trait, y the Academia Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Necromancer's Apprentice
entries.description:
You apprenticed under a necromancer-a hard education in a field where a cadaver you were dissecting could suddenly animate y every magical artifact seemed deadly. Now on your own, you're grateful you learned to identify magical threats quickly y thoroughly.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y the Necromancy Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification}.

entries.name: Newcomer In Need
entries.description:
You're a Gokan native in a bad spot, y you're going to need a miracle to get you out of your current fix. Miracles are in short supply, but the title of Ruby Phoenix Champion might just do the trick. Maybe you need the prize money to pay for a relative's expensive operation or to free your family from debt to Golden League gangsters. Or maybe there's a particular prize in Hao Jin's vault that could literally save your life - an amulet you can use to flee to the farthest corners of the multiverse or even an artifact that could resurrect you if you die, just like the Ruby Phoenix. The tough circumstances of your upbringing in one of Goka's more downtrodden neighborhoods - such as industrial Oldtown, the slums of the Scales district, or even the crime-ridden undercity taught you lessons of self-reliance y how to quickly make friends in unlikely circumstances. You've scraped together an entry into the Ruby Phoenix Tournament's prequalifier with a team you can trust. Now all that's left is to pull off the impossible y win this thing once y for all.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Society y the Goka Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Callejeo}.

entries.name: Nexian Mystic
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lys

Your initiations into the Nexian mysteries y the philosophies of the Arclords of Nex grant you a preternatural comprehension of the arcane underpinnings of existence.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y a Lore skill related to one plane of your choice (other than the Material Plane). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blMeVamjGz4ODWxq]{Arcane Sense}.

entries.name: Night Watch
entries.description:
When everyone else slumbers, you're on guard. You might have been a watch member in a teeming metropolis, the guard in an unquiet cemetery, or a lonely shepherd. Many a night you've shouted out warnings into the dark, unsure of what lurked just beyond the range of your lantern's light. More than once you've seen things shambling in the dark that never should have been up y about.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y either Legal Lore or the Lore skill for your home settlement. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ar2DUlvDK4LDcH9J]{Coacción rápida}.

entries.name: Nirmathi Guerrilla
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

Woodcraft comes naturally to you, y you have learned how to use the forest to your tactical advantage against superior forces in skirmishes against the Molthuni army or the Ironfang Legion.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y the Forest Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.beyw5bdA5hkQbmaG]{Terrain Stalker}(underbrush) .

entries.name: Noble
entries.description:
Para la gente común, la vida de un noble puede parecer un lujo idílico, pero tras crecer como noble o como aspirante a la nobleza conoces la realidad: el destino de un noble es la obligación y la intriga. Tanto si buscas escapar de tus deberes mediante las aventuras como si quieres mejorar tu estatus, has cambiado la pompa y el boato por la vida de aventurero.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y puedes elegir también entre Saber de la genealogía y Saber de la heráldica. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JtjnFsOToBLnSRO9]{Gracia cortesana}.

entries.name: Nómada
entries.description:
Viajando por todo lo largo y ancho del mundo, has acumulado tácticas de supervivencia básica por los caminos y en las tierras desconocidas, aprendiendo a subsistir con pocos suministros y aún menos comodidades. Como aventurero sigues viajando, a menudo a lugares incluso más peligrosos.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y en una habilidad de Saber relacionada con un terreno de los que has recorrido (como por ejemplo Saber del desierto o Saber de los pantanos). Con Supervivencia obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}.

entries.name: Northly Forager
entries.description:
The vast tundra y looming mountains of the Realm of the Mammoth Lords may seem featureless y barren to the untrained eye, but you know better. You see what others don't: nutritious roots buried beneath muddy reeds, succulent bird eggs cradled in craggy rocks, restorative berries nestled among thorny thickets, y more. In the south, farmers toil in dusty fields to eat the same vegetables every day, but your diet is varied y you're rarely hungry-the entire Realm is your garden.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y Saber del herbolario. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

entries.name: Occult Librarian
entries.description:
Hours spent reading numerous compendiums dedicated to various occult topics honed your knowledge of these more obscure magical arts. You might have taken to adventuring to finance your acquisition of rare tomes, to explore occult mysteries that can't be found in the pages of a book, or perhaps to put your skills to the test.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y the Academia Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lEgYzFHransLkSvI]{Schooled In Secrets}.

entries.name: Oenopion-Ooze Tender
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lys

Your apprenticeship in one of Oenopion's unorthodox arcane y alchemical academies instilled in you a deep reservoir of mostly reliable esoteric knowledge, not to mention a deep resentment born of countless hours spent mucking ooze pens y feeding helpless creatures to ravenous, belching jellies y gelatinous puddings.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Ooze Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Once Bitten
entries.description:
After an altercation with an undead creature, you feared you might be infected. Either through medical intervention, luck, or misunderstying how undeath spreads, your fears abated. However, your brush with living death taught you the value of life. You do whatever you can to avoid the end you thought you'd been fated.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y the Undead Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Medicina de guerra}.

entries.name: Onyx Trader
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

Oprak doesn't share the secrets of the Onyx Vault with many, but you are one of the lucky few to be permitted into the heart of the nation. You have traveled the extradimensional paths of the Stone Roads y traded goods across a wide variety of lys. You've learned to step lively in foreign markets of all types.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber mercantil. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingüe}.

entries.name: Osirionologist
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

Whether you're a fascinated outsider or a local proud of your nation's storied past, you're a devoted student of Osirion's history. You might be a traveling professor, a member of a society like the Pathfinders or the Esoteric Order of the Palatine Eye, or even a simple tomb robber cashing in on the glories of the past.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y the Ancient Osirion Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Identificar extrañezas}.

entries.name: Otherworldly Mission
entries.description:
You're called to serve a specific purpose-your deity told you so, y so it must be true. Maybe you grew up knowing all along, or maybe it came to you one day in a vision, clear as a bell y twice as loud. You have some task that only you can accomplish. You mission might be as dangerous as killing a deadly tyrant or as simple as opening a particular door on a particular day. You should work with your GM on how to hyle the truth of your character's backstory or leave it to the GM to decide in secret. Is this call to action a message from the character's own mind, are they being manipulated by some manner of supernatural entity, or are they actually getting marching orders from one of the deities of the setting?

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religion. Once per adventure, you can ask the voice you believe to be a deity for orders y get some kind of instruction-you never get any kind of explanation, simply a commy to go somewhere or do something. Following those commys isn't always safe, but it's usually interesting.

entries.name: Out-Of-Towner
entries.description:
You've never been to Breachill, nor do you have roots in the town, but as chance has it you find yourself visiting. You might be here traveling with a friend, visiting an old acquaintance, or merely here to see a new part of the world. Before coming to town, though, you spent many years living with an ancestry other than your own, y your diverse childhood has left you with an open mind y a curious nature.

You're excited to meet new people y cultures, y answering the Call for Heroes seems to be an interesting way to do so.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y a Lore skill thematically associated with the members of the ancestry you grew up with: Dwarf, Elf, Gnome, Goblin, or Halfling. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Confraternización}.

entries.name: Outrider
entries.description:
In your youth, you galloped on horseback over vast prairies, serving as a vanguard for your settlement, an army, or another group. Seeing so many different lys built a thirst in you to adventure y explore the world instead of just racing past it.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y the Plains Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gArdEleFCvUHtdGk]{Express Rider}.

entries.name: Ozem Experience
entries.description:
You or someone close to you worked with the Knights of Ozem before Lastwall fell. In addition to knowledge of the organization's tenets y goals, you have germane understying of the order's history. You believe there are valuable lessons in the Knights of Ozem's exploits.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JtjnFsOToBLnSRO9]{Gracia cortesana}.

entries.name: Pathfinder Hopeful
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom y Starstone Isle

You've long wanted to join the adventurous Pathfinder Society. You have taken up the dangerous life of an adventurer in hopes of earning a spot among the Pathfinders.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Pathfinder Society Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore}.

entries.name: Pathfinder Recruiter
entries.description:
The Pathfinder Society's always on the lookout for talent, but that talent rarely just stumbles into the Gry Lodge. Whether you're professionally trained to encourage new recruits or the Society's own scouts identified your potential y raised you from childhood, you're committed to expying the Society's roster.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y a en una habilidad de Saber elacionada con una ciudad que has visitado a menudo. You gain the Group Impression .

entries.name: Perfection Seeker
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lys

You aspire to perfect your body y mind in the tradition of Jalmeray's Houses of Perfection, honing your acrobatic skills y mental faculties in preparation for a lifetime pushing the edge of what most consider possible.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Acrobatics skill as well asSaber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Caída de gato}.

entries.name: Pilgrim
entries.description:
In your youth, you made several pilgrimages to important shrines y holy sites. You might have been a mendicant friar, a seller of holy relics (real or fraudulent), or just a simple farmer following the dictates of your faith. Whatever the aims of your wyerings now, your faith still protects you on the road.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y the Lore skill for your patron deity. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BqceQIKE0lwIS98s]{Pilgrim's Token}.

entries.name: Pillar
entries.description:
Not every Knight of Lastwall contributes to the crusade through combat. Pillars provide essential upkeep y service at camps, enjoying the same rank of knight as the crusaders y strategists for which the knights are known. You spent time as an assistant among the pillars, learning how noncombatants provide for the physical y mental wellbeing of an army.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades one of your choice of the Medicine, Society, or Survival skills, as well as Saber del trabajo manual. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore}.

entries.name: Plant Whisperer
entries.description:
You've always had a green thumb, allowing you to care for plants that others found too difficult to grow y tend with a skill that borders on the magical. As you travel, you encounter all sorts of new plants y plant creatures, allowing you to expy your horizons y deepen your understying of flora.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Nature y Plant Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WC4xLBGmBsdOdHWu]{Medicina natural}.

entries.name: Political Scion
entries.description:
Like your parents y your parents before them, you initially followed the long path toward politics from an early age. Your close association with Absalom's upper echelons put you in touch with the city's various military or special operations units-the First Guard, the Wave Riders, the Varlokkur-though you avoided any actual duty with these groups. Thanks to your strict upbringing y the connections of your family, you soon became a lauded y highly respected member of Absalom's political elite. But you couldn't stifle a certain feeling that you were destined for more than simply filling the pointed shoes of your forebears. Despite your easily earned accolades y a relatively cushy life as a young lawyer or councilmember, you sought to do more with your diplomatic training y not live out the exact same life as your ancestors.

Your decision to transfer to the Edgewatch has rubbed your traditionalist family the wrong way, y they've cut off the financial aid they've provided you your whole life. But you don't care-you know you're doing the right thing by taking on the rough jobs of a low-ranking guard, y you're ready to shine based on your own merits, not those of your lofty kin.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y Legal Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to Interact with members of Absalom's political establishment. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Confraternización}.

entries.name: Post Guard of All Trades
entries.description:
Not all cops are passionate about their jobs. For some, the pursuit of justice is just another way to pay the bills. Honestly, it was probably the Post Guard's generous time-off policy that drew you to their service, y during your yearly sabbaticals you've dabbled in hobbies as diverse as fishing, baking, or even sty-up comedy. Even while on duty, you're probably idly fiddling with a lucky coin or practicing magic tricks with a deck of cards. You probably irritate your fellow guards a bit with your non sequiturs, casual attitude, y tendency to daydream, but results don't lie, y more often than not you prove your worth when the chips are down.

For all the excitement of guarding Absalom's Postern Gate, the Post Guard wasn't really the right fit for someone as distractible as yourself, so your boss put in a "promotion" for you to transfer to the newly formed Edgewatch. You're all for the reassignment, since it will put you smack in the middle of the most entertaining y diverse gathering of the century, the Radiant Festival.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar, a Lore skill of your choice, y you gain a bonus language. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}with Post Guards. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Press-Ganged (G&G)
entries.description:
Was it five shots or six? It doesn't really matter in the end, because after those nice folks bought all your drinks, you woke up on the lowest rung of the ladder. Whether a crewmate on a ship, a conscript in an army, or something worse, you've nowhere to go but up. This background generally requires buy-in with the entire group to tell a story allowing you to play a character starting their adventuring due to circumstances outside their own control. However, you can also play a character who was once press-ganged y has since escaped that life. If you do, press-ganged doesn't have the uncommon trait, y it has the same mechanical effects either way.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y Saber del trabajo manual. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Lc4dJZivRwU3QEmT]{Armor Assist}.

entries.name: Press-Ganged (LOWG)
