entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

You were forced into service as a sailor against your will. Perhaps you were punished for a crime, were drafted into military service, are repaying a debt, or simply were abducted. Though you were initially trained as a simple deckhy, you may have subsequently studied a trade under one of the vessel's specialists.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber de la navegación. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{Experienced Professional}.

entries.name: Printer
entries.description:
Keeping your finger on the pulse of the city, you write a small news broadsheet to sell on street corners. You rent the use of a printing press to achieve this goal, so you're familiar with such machines. However, people y their stories are your main focus, y you adventure to chase the latest scoop.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber de la escritura. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingüe}.

entries.name: Prisionero
entries.description:
Puedes haber estado preso por algún delito (siendo culpable o no) o haber estado esclavizado durante alguna etapa de tu crianza. En tu vida de aventuras te aprovechas al máximo de tu recién estrenada libertad.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t3btih0O5RUwWynt]{Contrabandista experto}.

entries.name: Purveyor of the Bizzare
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

Whether in Katapesh or one of the bustling markets along the Path of Salt, you've spent enough time buying y selling ancient or unusual items to give you an instinctive ability to quickly sort valuable trinkets from worthless baubles.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y Saber mercantil. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification}.

entries.name: Pyre Tender
entries.description:
You're experienced at building funeral pyres. You might have lit flaming biers in the Ly of the Linnorm Kings, tended the cremation pits of Cheliax or Vudra, or been a backwoods charcoal burner, using the right mixture of alchemy to act as an accelerant. However you worship, you know nothing sends off the departed like flame.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Funeral Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting}.

entries.name: Quick
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Impossible Lys

Staying alive among the scheming, ravenous undead of Geb required a deep knowledge of their motivations, capabilities, y weaknesses. More often than not, it also required the ability to weave alibis y life-preserving half-truths capable of swaying a stilled heart.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Carisma o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y the Undead Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Mentiroso encantador}.

entries.name: Raised by Belief
entries.description:
Whether in a monastery, a religious household, or just as part of your everyday life, your upbringing was steeped in the traditions of a faith or philosophy. You might remain committed or you may have turned from your childhood creed, but your skills are still founded in your devotion.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One boost must be to an ability specified in the Divine Ability entry for your deity, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades your deity's associated skill, y you gain @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Seguro}with that skill. You gain a Lore skill with a subcategory associated with your deity (Abadar Lore, for instance).

entries.name: Ratted-Out Gun Runner
entries.description:
Sure, you've got a checkered past. Who doesn't? It's hard to make a living in the City of Smog, so you did what you could to put silvers in your pocket y food on the table. You made a good deal of money selling firearms from the Gunworks to people who perhaps shouldn't have had them. You even worked with wastely marauders a few times, sticking up Ustradi barges plying the river between the Gunworks y Alkenstar. Of course, you never hurt any innocents or did anything truly heinous; your criminal career was always just a matter of money.

One day, a corrupt financier named Ambrost Mugly-a true crook if there ever was one-approached you, demying a cut of your business. When you refused, he put in a word with the shieldmarshals that you'd be a certain somewhere at a certain time with a certain large quantity of illegally obtained firearms. Even though you escaped arrest, your identity was compromised, y your old accomplices have all turned their backs on you. Your gun-running days are clearly over. Now, you're just running.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y the Firearm Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.t3btih0O5RUwWynt]{Contrabandista experto}.

entries.name: Razmiran Faithful
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lys

You serve a living god who rules upon the face of Golarion, y this gives your actions a divine myate not to be trifled with.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y the Razmir Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Intimidación de grupo}.

entries.name: Reclaimed
entries.description:
A unit of Crimson Reclaimers saved you from certain death in the Gravelys. You spent time with one or more Crimson Reclaimers as they escorted you to safety, y you've learned the ways of this faction of the Knights of Lastwall. You consider yourself forever in their debt y defend their reputation unquestioningly against any accusations of duplicity.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y the Crimson Reclaimers Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Intimidación de grupo}.

entries.name: Reclaimer Investigator
entries.description:
You believe the mysterious patron of the Crimson Reclaimers has an ulterior motive that bedevils the Knights of Lastwall. Whatever the organization gains from the pact, some mysterious force with its own agenda y a need for anonymity benefits as well. You've made it your mission to determine what that agenda is before the patron decides it has manipulated from the shadows long enough.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y the Crimson Reclaimers Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Identificar extrañezas}.

entries.name: Refugee (APG)
entries.description:
You come from a ly very distant from the one you now find yourself in, driven by war, plague, or simply in the pursuit of opportunity. Regardless of your origin or the reason you left your home, you find yourself an outsider in this new ly. Adventuring is a way to support yourself while offering hope to those who need it most.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y a Lore skill related to the settlement you came from. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Callejeo}.

entries.name: Refugee (Fall of Plaguestone)
entries.description:
The fighting around the Lake Encarthan region has forced many of the people residing there to flee from the violence. Although your home is gone, you have managed to survive y are making your way south in search of a better life. When play begins, you are riding along in a caravan taking you to what might be either a new home in yoran or simply another waypoint in your journey.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Hunting Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

entries.name: Relentless Dedication
entries.description:
Recruiters invite many cyidates like you to train to be Knights of Lastwall, but only a select few make the cut. Whereas others lose heart, your perseverance paid off. Your commitment to the cause is so clear, it overcame whatever disqualified your previous attempts to join the new Shining Crusade.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidadesSaber de la guerra, y Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.i4yRvVwvXbGZDsD1]{Canny Acumen}feat.

entries.name: Reputation Seeker
entries.description:
You're likely from Breachill, but unlike the Local Scion, your family has no notable legacy in the area. You might not even have much of a family at all to call your own, y could be an orphan. You've seen so many people make names for themselves that you set out on your own y spent some time abroad in the jungles or deserts of Garund or in the upper reaches of the Darklys-regions that proved too dangerous to remain in for long on your own. You returned home with more caution y knowledge of the world beyond Breachill's borders, but still determined to win fame.

You've decided that joining an adventuring group would be the best way to secure aid in your quest to build your own reputation, y are attending the Call for Heroes to find such allies.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Darklys, Desert, or Jungle Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Terrain Expertise}skill feat (underground if you have Darklys Lore, desert if you have Desert Lore, or forest if you have Jungle Lore).

entries.name: Returned
entries.description:
You died y miraculously returned with knowledge of the realms beyond death y a stronger link to life. Some dead y undead souls might feel a strange, instinctual kinship with you.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.I0BhPWqYf1bbzEYg]{Diehard}feat y the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore}feat for Boneyard Lore.

entries.name: Returning Descendant
entries.description:
You aren't from Breachill yourself-you might not even be from Isger or Avistan at all. You've lived a hard life, in any event. You have often had to make tough decisions, y have developed a knack for understying how things work (y the best way to take them apart) that has helped you support yourself. Recently you discovered that an ancestor was from the town of Breachill y had a modest career as an adventurer. You can't help but wonder if you would have had an easier life if you'd grown up there instead, y have decided to seek out this small town to learn more about it.

You've decided to respond to the Call for Heroes to follow in your ancestor's footsteps, either to honor their memory or accomplish the great deeds they did not.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Latrocinio y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jDdOqFmZLwE4dblQ]{Carterista}.

entries.name: Revenant
entries.description:
You died. No real doubt about that. Bullet to the brain or knife to the throat, you were dead as dead can be. Then you got back up again. Maybe you had some unfinished business, or maybe you were just so tough y so mean that Hell itself spat you out. Either way, you came back for a reason.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religion y Boneyard Lore. You're still alive, not undead, but you have the negative healing ability, which means you're harmed by positive damage y healed by negative effects as if you were undead.

entries.name: Rigger
entries.description:
You've worked as a roustabout to erect tents y set up rigging for acrobatic performances; you've sometimes even aided aerialists y acrobats in their death-defying training. Even though your work is often done before the crowds arrive, you know your skills contribute to the success y safety of the circus. Mistress Dusklight treats her roustabouts as little more than slaves, y you've resolved to join a company where your expertise is appreciated.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y Saber del circo. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.09PurtIanNUPfNRq]{Combat Climber}.

entries.name: Rivethun Adherent
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

You have spent time learning the practices y traditions of the ancient Rivethun dwarven shamans y can recognize all sorts of magic. You may have chosen your own road since then, or you may remain an adherent of the philosophy.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y the Spirit Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Root Worker
entries.description:
Some ailments can't be cured by herbs alone. You learned ritual remedies as well, calling on nature spirits to soothe aches y ward off the evil eye. Taking up with adventurers has given you company on the road, as well as protection from those who would bry you a fake-or worse.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y Saber del herbolario. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.22P7IFyhrF7Fbw8B]{Root Magic}.

entries.name: Rostly Partisan
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lys

You grew up among the southern houses of Brevoy in old Rostly. You're accustomed to arguing from a position of underappreciated worth.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Politics Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Impresión de grupo}.

entries.name: Royalty
entries.description:
You are a prominent member of a royal family. You have taken up the life of an adventurer-perhaps you're a deposed queen hoping to regain her throne, a prince seeking a more exciting life, or a princess on a secret mission.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

You are trained in Society. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JtjnFsOToBLnSRO9]{Gracia cortesana}skill feat y can influence commoners in your family's territory, as well as nobility anywhere. If you later gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iCv8KTZ5PcF4GqeV]{Connections}skill feat, you automatically have common y noble connections within any community in your royal family's territory y have noble connections in large communities outside your territory.

entries.name: Ruby Phoenix Enthusiast
entries.description:
Named for the legendary sorcerer Hao Jin, the Ruby Phoenix Tournament occurs once every 10 years in Goka y attracts extraordinary talent from across the world. You might have begun training for the tournament but never participated, or perhaps you entered the tournament only to be defeated by (y inspired to join) the Pathfinder Society. Either way, your dedicated training prepares you for the rigors of the adventuring lifestyle.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y Saber de los gladiadores. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.09PurtIanNUPfNRq]{Combat Climber}skill feat. In addition, you gain access to one of the following uncommon monk weapons:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zSAoyzcf3nSeZCiF]{Kama},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LA8wwpQBi6tylE6z]{Nunchaku},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.u2u6dkr01AB34tyA]{Sai},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.fjkwYZ0hRmBztwBG]{Shuriken}, or
  • @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NIsxR5zXtVa3PuyU]{Temple Sword}.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 3 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Ruby Phoenix Fanatic
entries.description:
Have you heard of the peerless sorcerer Hao Jin, also known as the Ruby Phoenix? Of course you have! You're her biggest fan! She's got amazing powers of self-resurrection, her hair is as red y fiery as a phoenix, y she has a huge vault full of the most incredible treasures in the multiverse. Now she's finally back from a mysterious 300-year quest on the plane of Axis so she can host this year's Ruby Phoenix Tournament—y you can't wait to meet her! In order to get as close to Hao Jin as possible, you've researched everything there is to know about the Ruby Phoenix's home, her planar escapades, y her competition. You've also trained your body to prove yourself a worthy champion. When Hao Jin's committee invited you y some friends to take part in the tournament's prequalifier, you just about fainted from excitement. Is your dream of meeting the Ruby Phoenix about to come true? As long as you win enough matches to get into the actual tournament, it just might! Just try not to act too star-struck when you finally get a chance to talk to her, okay?

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Axis Lore, Gladiatorial Lore, y Goka Lore skills. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Ruin Delver
entries.description:
You've looked through some of the smaller ruins in the Otari hinterlys but have never quite built up the courage to check out the creepy lighthouse called Gauntlight. You've heard that these ruins are pretty well picked over, y mostly collapsed, but you always planned to some day explore them y perhaps find some bauble left behind from the centuries-old battle where the Roseguard slew an evil sorcerer. You know that the crumbled stone of old ruins has a tendency to shift, so you'd better step lightly if you get the chance to explore Gauntlight.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Acrobatics y the Roseguard Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Caída de gato}.

entries.name: Saboteur
entries.description:
Whether you do it for personal enjoyment or at the behest of a mercenary company or military organization, you have a knack for destroying things. You have a sense for an object or structure's weak spots y know where to deliver a hammer strike or alchemical bomb. You adventure to hone your skills or complete a particular mission.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Latrocinio y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B9cQLRHtXoLlF0iR]{Concealing Legerdemain}.

entries.name: Marino
entries.description:
Oíste la llamada del mar desde muy temprana edad. Quizá te enrolaste en un mercante, te alistaste en la marina o te uniste a una tripulación de piratas o de rufianes.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One must be to Strength or Dexterity, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y Saber de la navegación. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iOY6YfGBaOvMNAor]{Merodeador subactuático}.

entries.name: Sally Guard Neophyte
entries.description:
You joined the Sally Guard, Westgate's guard precinct, at an early age, bringing with you the requisite steel armor, sword, y lance, though your gear is of dubious make. The other guards may have suspected that you were a novice with less combat experience than them; if so, you proved their suspicions on your first day of training when your mount immediately threw you in the mud. A supervisor took mercy on you y offered to transfer you to another guard unit in the city, promising that you'd have a place on the Sally Guard when you decided you were ready for the challenge.

Biting your lip in shame, you took the Edgewatch reassignment in order to gain the experience necessary to go back to your home district with your head held high. You'll prove them wrong, one way or another, y show everyone that you can protect the ones you hold most dear.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y your choice of Hunting Lore or Stabling Lore. You start out with a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.In2nNwo3JL1RXQhj]{Riding Horse}, as well as a suit of shoddy @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.pRoikbRo5HFW6YUB]{Half Plate}armor, a shoddy @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword}, y a shoddy @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.OPMzQdM9rZznMGhW]{Lance}.

entries.name: Saloon Entertainer
entries.description:
All you want to do is entertain the people, but sure enough, bad news seems to follow you. Gunfights, brawls, robberies, y more befall establishments you play at, y word is quick to spread. Keep one town ahead of the gossip, y you just might be able to play a gig, commy a stage, or run a table again.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Carisma o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y a lore skill of your choice. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lFwfUvH2708rl6i3]{Virtuosic Performer}.

entries.name: Sarkorian Reclaimer
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lys

Whether you trace your heritage to lost Sarkoris or are a crusader trying to atone for past fanatics' wrongs, you seek to liberate the Sarkorian homely from the demons who have defiled it.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y one is a free boost.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y the Abyssal Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Medicina de guerra}.

entries.name: Sarkorian Survivor
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lys

The devastation y carnage of the Worldwound were nearly complete, but you somehow managed to survive it.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y one is a free boost.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Sarkorian History Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

entries.name: Saved by Clockwork
entries.description:
Through bloody combat, a terrible accident, or purposeful sacrifice, you've lost some piece of your body that has been replaced with a clockwork mechanism. Whether your arm is now a whirring series of pumps, steel coils, y iron gears; your heart a intricate crystal clock that requires winding every day; or your lower leg a sculpted metal tube powered by adamantine springs y steam, part of you needs regular maintenance y repair. You might have received instructions from the brilliant inventor who saved you, or you might have woken up on a battlefield with no memory of the procedure or the individuals involved. Regardless, you possess the knowledge to take care of yourself-even if it's how to wind a key in your own heart or reconstruct a mechanical foot.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía. Every day you must perform 10 minutes of maintenance y wind up your clockwork parts, or you risk failure of the components, with consequences depending on what you replaced (determined by you y the GM). Your clockwork components allow you to react to danger with alacrity. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.

entries.name: Savior of Air
entries.description:
Upon securing the Untouchable Opal, an artifact of extraordinary power, the Pathfinder Society endeavored to free the benevolent demigod Ranginori, who was trapped within the virtually unbreakable prison. You might have joined the Pathfinder Society in its expeditions to the Elemental Planes, or you might have lived on one of those planes before learning of the Society from these Pathfinder agents. You are no stranger to navigating precarious terrain as a result.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Acrobatics skill, plus either Elemental Lords Lore or a Lore skill related either to one of the Elemental Planes (such as Plane of Air Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Caída de gato}skill feat. Add Auran to the list of additional languages you can learn for having a high Intelligence modifier.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 8 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Scavenger
entries.description:
You've made a living sorting through the things society throws away. You might have scavenged simply to survive, or plied a trade as a ragpicker, dung carter, or the like. While you've left that life behind, you still keep one eye on the ground out of habit.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Lore skill for the settlement you grew up scavenging in. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

entries.name: Erudito (Arcanos)
entries.description:
Se te da muy bien aprender y pasaste mucho tiempo apartado del mundo exterior para aprender todo lo que pudiste. Leíste acerca de tantos lugares y cosas maravillosos en tus libros que siempre soñaste con verlos en realidad algún día. Por último, la curiosidad te impulsó a dejar tus estudios y convertirte en aventurero.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en una habilidad de Arcanos. También estás entrenado en la habilidad en la habilidad Saber académico. @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5nTNxbOx6G8ZmSp4]{Seguro (Arcana)}.

entries.name: Erudito (Naturaleza)
entries.description:
Se te da muy bien aprender y pasaste mucho tiempo apartado del mundo exterior para aprender todo lo que pudiste. Leíste acerca de tantos lugares y cosas maravillosos en tus libros que siempre soñaste con verlos en realidad algún día. Por último, la curiosidad te impulsó a dejar tus estudios y convertirte en aventurero.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en una habilidad de Naturaleza. También estás entrenado en la habilidad en la habilidad Saber académico. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tLlCyLH6KM1Zc4we]{Seguro (Nature)}.

entries.name: Erudito (Ocultismo)
entries.description:
Se te da muy bien aprender y pasaste mucho tiempo apartado del mundo exterior para aprender todo lo que pudiste. Leíste acerca de tantos lugares y cosas maravillosos en tus libros que siempre soñaste con verlos en realidad algún día. Por último, la curiosidad te impulsó a dejar tus estudios y convertirte en aventurero.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en una habilidad de Ocultismo. También estás entrenado en la habilidad en la habilidad Saber académico. @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.L16JV4LkA3yEuPOt]{Seguro (Occultism)}skill feat in your chosen skill.

entries.name: Erudito (Religión)
entries.description:
Se te da muy bien aprender y pasaste mucho tiempo apartado del mundo exterior para aprender todo lo que pudiste. Leíste acerca de tantos lugares y cosas maravillosos en tus libros que siempre soñaste con verlos en realidad algún día. Por último, la curiosidad te impulsó a dejar tus estudios y convertirte en aventurero.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en una habilidad de Religión. También estás entrenado en la habilidad en la habilidad Saber académico. @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z0GLAoJCXyDApSSk]{Seguro (Religion)}.

entries.name: Erudito of the Ancients
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

You're fascinated by the lost Azlanti Empire y have dedicated yourself to seeking out y studying every broken artifact or scrap of knowledge that remains, whether as an academic pursuit or simply for the joy of treasure hunting.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y the Azlant Lore skills. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification}.

entries.name: Erudito of the Sky Key
entries.description:
The unfamiliar technology of Numeria's Silver Mount still baffles Society scholars, yet you are one of the innovators who discovered how to operate a hyful of these futuristic tools-possibly after surviving more than a few explosions. The Society might have recruited you for your esoteric abilities, or you might have sought out the Society's protection in escaping the covetously vile Technic League. Even if your understying of advanced technology is imperfect, your hard-learned lessons are invaluable in deciphering y repairing gear.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ASy9AKEIRxPYUi5o]{Quick Repair}.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 6 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Scion of Slayers
entries.description:
You were born into a lineage of undead slayers. No mere occupation, in your family slaying is a mantle of almost mystic responsibility passed from parent to child. Over the generations, this single-minded focus has begun to manifest in uncanny ways during combat.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Undead Lore skill. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{Disrupt Undead} as an innate divine cantrip. You can use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability for this innate spell.

entries.name: Batidor
entries.description:
Las tierras vírgenes eran tu hogar, y en ellas encontrabas senderos por los que guiar a los viajeros. Tu ansia viajera te puede haber llevado a la vida de aventurero, o quizá fuiste batidor para un ejército y averiguaste que te gustaba la batalla.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y en una habilidad de Saber relacionada con un terreno de los que has recorrido (como por ejemplo Saber de los bosques o Saber de las cavernas). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forrajeador}.

entries.name: Second Chance Champion
entries.description:
You competed in the last Ruby Phoenix Tournament 10 years ago, though you didn't make it to the end. One wrong step, one mistimed punch, one blocked spell—whatever it was, that was all it took for your opponent to get the upper hy y knock you out of the tournament. Well, maybe it was a simple mistake or maybe you just weren't up to snuff, y you're too headstrong to admit it. Now, after training for a decade to ensure you don't repeat any of your prior mistakes, you've joined forces with a team of fellow fighters in order to maximize your odds of making it all the way to the finals. Whatever happened before, you've vowed to return to the ring in Goka for an epic rematch, y this time you're not walking out until you've been named Ruby Phoenix Champion.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Fuerza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Acrobatics y Saber de los gladiadores. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LQw0yIMDUJJkq1nD]{Caída de gato}skill feat

entries.name: Secular Medic
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

You're from Rahadoum, where the Laws of Mortality taught you to reject the gods, yet you've seen firsthy how dangerous it can be to go without healing magic. As a result, you've thrown yourself into the study of medicine, so you can save lives without saving souls.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y the Anatomy Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Medicina de guerra}.

entries.name: Seer of the Dead
entries.description:
You have long been gifted with the ability to see y speak with the departed. This could have manifested at your birth or when a chance encounter linked you inextricably to the spirits of the dead. Their constant presence might feel like a curse, or it might provide you with welcome companionship.

You gain one ability boost. It must be to Constitution o Sabiduria.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religion y Undead Lore. You gain the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3ehSrqTAm7IPqbIZ]{Spirit Sense} spell at all times.

entries.name: Senghor Sailor
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

As an experienced sailor from Senghor, you know that the only thing saving you from disaster on the high seas is a properly maintained ship. You know boat-building inside y out y you can quickly cobble together a solution in the event that something breaks.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber de la navegación. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ASy9AKEIRxPYUi5o]{Quick Repair}.

entries.name: Sentinel Reflectance
entries.description:
Either through witnessing their deeds y devout heroics firsthy, or through reading chronicles of their exploits, the Shining Sentinels of the Knights of Lastwall inspire you. You may idealize their philosophy or one day hope to join their ranks; the Shining Sentinels are your guiding star.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Shining Sentinels Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6ON8DjFXSMITZleX]{No Cause for Alarm}.

entries.name: Servant
entries.description:
You held a role of servitude, waiting on nobles y engendering their trust as one of the confidantes of the household. You might have walked away on good terms, or perhaps you know dangerous secrets about your former masters. Regardless, you're adventuring for a change y finding that in this new role, the skills you've learned now serve you.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber del trabajo manual. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yUuU9xyotrpwpTyC]{Read Lips}.

entries.name: Sewer Dragon
entries.description:
Prerequisites Kobald Ancestry

You are one of the Sewer Dragons, born in Absalom's sewers, strengthened by a life defending your territory.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y one is a free ability boost. Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Kobold Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DMetdzt1VJL2Y62i]{Snare Crafting}.

entries.name: Shadow Haunted
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Old Cheliax

You are from Nidal, y regardless of your personal values, Zon-Kuthon has a claim on your soul due to an ancient pact. The Midnight Lord's unsettling influence is bred deep into your bones.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y the Shadow Plane Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ar2DUlvDK4LDcH9J]{Coacción rápida}.

entries.name: Shadow Lodge Defector
entries.description:
You were among the Pathfinders recruited by the devious Shadow Lodge, lured in by promises of wealth, reform, justice, or revenge. You might have fought against the Society's loyal agents, helped sabotage the Pathfinders' reputation in distant countries, or even infiltrated the far-flung lodges as a spy. You've since made peace with y rejoined the Pathfinder Society, yet the underhyed reflexes y skills you learned are hard to forget.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Miénteme}.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 2 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Shadow War Survivor
entries.description:
Countless factions have fought for influence in Absalom for millennia, y for decades these groups worked through the Pathfinder Society to better control the City at the Center of the World. Perhaps you were ones of these agents who clashed with other operatives during the so-called Shadow War. Or you might have been an unintended victim of these clyestine clashes, inspiring you to join the Society y stop the conflict from within. Whatever the reason, navigating the Shadow War has left you politically savvy y informed.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Absalom Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{Callejeo}.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 1 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Sheriff
entries.description:
You hold an official title of sheriff or deputy in a small community. Those that would do harm to others flee your gaze, for they know it brings the promise of castigation. You protect your town, watch over those who have placed their trust in you, y make sure those that would do others harm are brought to justice.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y the Hunting Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gUqvezs2zzoTXFAI]{Intimidación de grupo}.

entries.name: Shoanti Name-Bearer
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lys

You are a member of a Shoanti quah y have gone through its coming of age ceremony, gaining the traditional tattoo of your quah y earning your adult name.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Quah Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.09PurtIanNUPfNRq]{Combat Climber}.

entries.name: Shory Seeker
entries.description:
You've dedicated your life to unraveling the secrets of the ancient Shory Empire, either through meticulous research or by traveling into dangerous y distant ruins to track down long-lost artifacts.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Shory Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Especialidad artesana}.

entries.name: Sleepless Suns Star
entries.description:
Among your fellow guards who patrol the Foreign Quarter, you're something of a big deal. Your good work y big personality have made a big enough splash that word has gotten out about your status as a rising star among the watchdogs of Absalom. Your popularity has also earned you the trust of many citizens of the Foreign Quarter.

Your laudable performance has earned you a transfer to the newly formed Edgewatch in the Precipice Quarter, where you'll put your formidable reputation to good use by patrolling the Radiant Festival y ensuring the safety of Absalom's most vulnerable visitors.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Society, plus either Gladiatorial Lore or Genealogy Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact}with members of the Sleepless Suns y residents of the Foreign Quarter. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingüe}.

entries.name: Snubbed Out Stoolie
entries.description:
You were once a distinguished informant for the shieldmarshals, working deep undercover to infiltrate gangs of bootleggers y assassins. Then, one day, you discovered that the records of your service had all been completely destroyed. In an instant, you were no longer an elite spy impersonating a criminal-you were just a plain criminal.

Now, not a trace remains of your work for the city. Not only is it as though you were never a shieldmarshal at all, but you've got a rap sheet implicating you as a key member in the criminal organizations you spent your career infiltrating. Luckily, no one could take away the skills you learned from your deep-cover missions, y your new notoriety has earned you quite a reputation among Alkenstar's criminal elite. Through your underworld connections, you've identified Deputy Shieldmarshal Anjelique Loveless as the one responsible for your fall from grace. It seems you were onto something that she didn't want you to know about, but there's only one way to figure out exactly why Loveless ruined your reputation y gave you your outlaw status-find her.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Miénteme}.

entries.name: Sodden Scavenger
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

You've managed to eke out an existence in the storm-wracked Sodden Lys y have become an expert at scavenging food y tools.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Swamp Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

entries.name: Song of the Deep
entries.description:
During a sea voyage, you washed overboard, ingested sea water, y drowned. Merfolk, kelpies, sea serpents, or another magical denizen of the sea pulled your unconscious body from the briny depths. Having spent so much time underwater, your lungs were filled with salt water. To restore your ability to breathe, they exhaled into your lungs y shared the ability to breathe underwater in the process. You came back with the ability to breathe water, as well as a newfound knowledge of your time beneath the waves.

You gain one ability boost. It must be to Fuerza, Constitution, o Carisma.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Ocean Lore skill. You have the ability to breathe underwater.

Special You can choose to lose the ability to breathe air when you take this background, making you only able to breathe underwater. If you do, you gain a second ability boost, which is a free ability boost.

entries.name: Songsinger in Training
entries.description:
You are a pupil of Argakoa the Songsinger, Otter House leader y Mammoth Lord. Argakoa has been the Broken Tusk's foremost songsinger for many winters, y she sees in you a promising disciple who can carry the torch when it's time for her to pass it. The role of songsinger is a great distinction. These chanters, musicians, y poets are responsible for recording, preserving, y sharing the Broken Tusk's oral history. As one of these songsingers, it's up to you to decide which stories are worthy of passing on y which should be left along the migration trail.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y the Genealogy Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{Interpretación impresionante}.

entries.name: Spell Seeker (Arcana)
entries.description:
Conventional magic can only hold your attention for so long. Instead, you've devoted yourself to understying truly esoteric spells, which invariably draws you to explore the world y all its eldritch traditions.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

You're trained the Arcana skill, as well as the Library Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Spell Seeker (Occult)
entries.description:
Conventional magic can only hold your attention for so long. Instead, you've devoted yourself to understying truly esoteric spells, which invariably draws you to explore the world y all its eldritch traditions.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Occult skill, as well as the Library Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Sponsored by a Stranger (Nature)
entries.description:
You remember the day the stranger approached you to make several peculiar inquiries. You don't remember much about them, other than a large head y a frail body. At first, the stranger's questions seemed odd: how might forgotten history nevertheless shape the present, whether an insect hive mind could be manipulated at a distance, y so on. You don't remember all of the questions, y you don't know why you could refuse to answer some but felt compelled to answer others. The stranger nevertheless seemed pleased with your responses y insisted you would find study at the Magaambya enlightening. You never saw them again, but you're now here at the Magaambya, with more questions than answers about your future.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza. You gain your choice of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification}skill feat. You're also trained in Insect Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Rain-Scribes.

Note: This will grant you two feats. You need to delete the second one manually.

entries.name: Sponsored by a Stranger (Occultism)
entries.description:
You remember the day the stranger approached you to make several peculiar inquiries. You don't remember much about them, other than a large head y a frail body. At first, the stranger's questions seemed odd: how might forgotten history nevertheless shape the present, whether an insect hive mind could be manipulated at a distance, y so on. You don't remember all of the questions, y you don't know why you could refuse to answer some but felt compelled to answer others. The stranger nevertheless seemed pleased with your responses y insisted you would find study at the Magaambya enlightening. You never saw them again, but you're now here at the Magaambya, with more questions than answers about your future.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo. You gain your choice of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IlOQuCQIhjJpig3S]{Quick Identification}skill feat. You're also trained in Insect Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Rain-Scribes.

Note: This will grant you two feats. You need to delete the second one manually.

entries.name: Sponsored by a Village (Crafting)
entries.description:
You come from a small community far from any large cities, but the Magaambya is known even in your isolated corner of the world. You have shown more scholarly talent than anyone from your village in many years, perhaps even generations, y the village elders have insisted you explore your potential at the Magaambya. Whether you were eager to leave or not seemed irrelevant to the elders; you had the talent, so you must go. You don't know how the elders had the connections or influence to sponsor your education there, but you've left your tightknit community behind for the city of Nantambu y the Magaambya at its heart.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.voYr7ygVcWmlg1f4]{Crafter's Appraisal}skill feat. You're also trained in the Lore skill appropriate for the terrain around your community (such as Forest Lore or Jungle Lore).

Your recommended primary branch is the Casacade Bearers.

entries.name: Sponsored by a Village (Survival)
entries.description:
You come from a small community far from any large cities, but the Magaambya is known even in your isolated corner of the world. You have shown more scholarly talent than anyone from your village in many years, perhaps even generations, y the village elders have insisted you explore your potential at the Magaambya. Whether you were eager to leave or not seemed irrelevant to the elders; you had the talent, so you must go. You don't know how the elders had the connections or influence to sponsor your education there, but you've left your tightknit community behind for the city of Nantambu y the Magaambya at its heart.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}skill feat. You're also trained in the Lore skill appropriate for the terrain around your community (such as Forest Lore or Jungle Lore).

Your recommended primary branch is the Casacade Bearers.

entries.name: Sponsored by Family (Diplomacy)
entries.description:
Several members of your family have studied at the Magaambya, although not all of them have graduated as lore-speakers (or even advanced past initiates to become attendants). Your family has decided that you're an excellent cyidate to join their ranks. Although lore-speakers of the Magaambya know they are supported by the strength of thousys of graduates who have come before them, you can take the smaller, more personal comfort in the support of your family.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Confraternización}skill feat. You're also trained in Magaambya Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Uzunjati.

entries.name: Sponsored by Family (Society)
entries.description:
Several members of your family have studied at the Magaambya, although not all of them have graduated as lore-speakers (or even advanced past initiates to become attendants). Your family has decided that you're an excellent cyidate to join their ranks. Although lore-speakers of the Magaambya know they are supported by the strength of thousys of graduates who have come before them, you can take the smaller, more personal comfort in the support of your family.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0N8TtGSk5enoLBZ8]{Eye For Numbers}skill feat. You're also trained in Magaambya Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Uzunjati.

entries.name: Sponsored by Teacher Ot (Performance)
entries.description:
You have known the Magaambyan teacher Takulu Ot y his wife Niana for many years. Both are amateur bird-watchers y musicians, y you share one of these hobbies. They are pleasant people y well-regarded in Nantambu, although their unshakable generosity y friendliness strike cynics as too earnest to be genuine. You know otherwise; Takulu y Niana are just as sincere as they appear. Takulu always seemed to watch you with a discerning eye, y one day he idly observed that you'd do well at the Magaambya. Talking about it further with him, Takulu agreed that he would sponsor you personally y be the one to give your intake interview. With a twinkle in his eye, he asked that you call him Teacher Ot from now on, just as all of his students do.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{Interpretación impresionante}skill feat. You're also trained in Nantambu Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Emerald Boughs.

entries.name: Sponsored by Teacher Ot (Survival)
entries.description:
You have known the Magaambyan teacher Takulu Ot y his wife Niana for many years. Both are amateur bird-watchers y musicians, y you share one of these hobbies. They are pleasant people y well-regarded in Nantambu, although their unshakable generosity y friendliness strike cynics as too earnest to be genuine. You know otherwise; Takulu y Niana are just as sincere as they appear. Takulu always seemed to watch you with a discerning eye, y one day he idly observed that you'd do well at the Magaambya. Talking about it further with him, Takulu agreed that he would sponsor you personally y be the one to give your intake interview. With a twinkle in his eye, he asked that you call him Teacher Ot from now on, just as all of his students do.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tGIXuk0XeWmG04CX]{Survey Wildlife}skill feat. You're also trained in Nantambu Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Emerald Boughs.

entries.name: Spotter
entries.description:
An eye for detail, a sense for the wind, y a strong trust in your gut feelings. These qualities have set you apart from others when it comes to assisting a sharpshooter with setting up the perfect shot against their target. Elevation, velocity, y concealment-these are all vital factors that need to be considered to pull off a feat of true marksmanship, y no sniper would be able to function without an experienced spotter. Since your younger days, you've put your skills as a spotter to work as an adventurer. Whether you're taking your own shots now or spotting for others, your talents grant you an edge in an adventuring career.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo y the Scouting Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.beyw5bdA5hkQbmaG]{Terrain Stalker}.

entries.name: Squire
entries.description:
You trained at the feet of a knight, maintaining their gear y supporting them at tourneys y in battle. Now you search for a challenge that will prove you worthy of full knighthood, or you've spurned pomp y ceremony to test yourself in honest, albeit less formal, combat.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y your choice of the Heraldry Lore or Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Lc4dJZivRwU3QEmT]{Armor Assist}.

entries.name: Starwatcher
entries.description:
You're one of Wrin Sivinxi's closest confidantes. You've spent many long nights with her under the stars, learning the tales associated with the Cosmic Caravan y how the heavens can predict the future. You know that Wrin has paralyzing claustrophobia; she sees menace in angles y danger in confined spaces, which is why her shop is an all domed canvas that opens to the sky. If Wrin thinks there's trouble, you'll be the first to offer to help.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y the Astrology Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Storm Survivor
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

Through luck or through skill, you managed to survive a catastrophic maritime disaster, such as a shipwreck or being thrown overboard. You have a keen sense for weather or situations that are similar to the one you escaped.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Weather Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

entries.name: Street Preacher
entries.description:
Forget the church orthodoxy y the stuffy cloisters-spreading the word of your god to the people is your calling. You've preached on the street corners y in public houses, to wyerers on the road y to captives in the stocks. Adventuring can take you across the world. What vocation could better serve to take your holy words to fresh ears?

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y the Lore skill for your patron deity. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Golfillo
entries.description:
Te ganabas (apenas) la vida vaciando bolsillos en las calles de una gran ciudad, sin saber dónde encontrar tu siguiente comida. Si bien algunos se van de aventuras en busca de la gloria, tú lo haces para sobrevivir.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Latrocinio y en una habilidad de Saber para la ciudad en la que ejercías de golfillo (como por ejemplo, Saber de Absalom o Saber de Magnimar). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jDdOqFmZLwE4dblQ]{Carterista}.

entries.name: Student of Magic (Arcana)
entries.description:
You are currently enrolled at a school of magic, where you're learning the fundamentals of your magical tradition. Whether your adventuring occurs during breaks between semesters, as part of a work study program, or even within the halls of the academy itself, you'll have to learn to juggle your dual life.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y Academia Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Student of Magic (Nature)
entries.description:
You are currently enrolled at a school of magic, where you're learning the fundamentals of your magical tradition. Whether your adventuring occurs during breaks between semesters, as part of a work study program, or even within the halls of the academy itself, you'll have to learn to juggle your dual life.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y Academia Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Student of Magic (Occultism)
entries.description:
You are currently enrolled at a school of magic, where you're learning the fundamentals of your magical tradition. Whether your adventuring occurs during breaks between semesters, as part of a work study program, or even within the halls of the academy itself, you'll have to learn to juggle your dual life.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y Academia Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Student of Magic (Religion)
entries.description:
You are currently enrolled at a school of magic, where you're learning the fundamentals of your magical tradition. Whether your adventuring occurs during breaks between semesters, as part of a work study program, or even within the halls of the academy itself, you'll have to learn to juggle your dual life.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y Academia Lore. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Recognize Spell}.

entries.name: Surge Investigator (Nature)
entries.description:
From rivers that charm all who come near to forests that speak through dream messages, you have seen y studied many kinds of magical terrain. The world is so rich in magic that it can affect the ly itself, y you have traveled extensively to learn the ways of identifying the oddities of magical terrain wherever it arises.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One must be Constitution o Sabiduria y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Nature y the Magical Terrain Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Terrain Expertise}.

entries.name: Surge Investigator (Occultism)
entries.description:
From rivers that charm all who come near to forests that speak through dream messages, you have seen y studied many kinds of magical terrain. The world is so rich in magic that it can affect the ly itself, y you have traveled extensively to learn the ways of identifying the oddities of magical terrain wherever it arises.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One must be Constitution o Sabiduria y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Occultism y the Magical Terrain Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Terrain Expertise}.

entries.name: Taldan Schemer
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

Whether willing or unwilling, you have been involved in the many cutthroat political intrigues within Taldor. You might have been born into it as a member of the aristocracy, or you might have taken an active role in the recent events of the War for the Crown.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Carisma o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Politics Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Confraternización}.

entries.name: Tall Tale
entries.description:
You've ridden a tornado, lassoed a river, mooned a dragon under a full moon, y shot six zombies with one bullet. That's what the stories say, anyway, y even if people don't strictly believe them, they are curious about you. Certainly, the stories keep spreading, y it would appear that you either have a unique destiny or are trying to convince the world that you do.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Performance. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqAdXRd2gSQcqp5E]{Interpretación impresionante}skill feat. You can gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iCv8KTZ5PcF4GqeV]{Connections}skill feat later without being expert in Society or having Courtly Graces-this represents less traditional social connections y more the way that your legend has spread, y you've learned to leverage your legend, with people wanting to meet you y see you for themselves.

entries.name: Tapestry Refugee (Medicine)
entries.description:
Within her magnificent museum demiplane, the sorcerer Hao Jin extracted y preserved countless sites y cultures. The demiplane's unraveling magic forced the Pathfinder Society to evacuate the many inhabitants recently, y you were among the refugees who returned to the Material Plane after centuries of isolation. Whether you joined the Society out of gratitude, curiosity, or desperation, you are hardened by your harrowing flight from your doomed home.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina, plus a Lore skill related to the terrain you lived in while on the demiplane (such as Cave Lore or Desert Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yPwVPu2QLhnx2gdB]{Seguro (Medicine)}.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 10 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Tapestry Refugee (Stealth)
entries.description:
Within her magnificent museum demiplane, the sorcerer Hao Jin extracted y preserved countless sites y cultures. The demiplane's unraveling magic forced the Pathfinder Society to evacuate the many inhabitants recently, y you were among the refugees who returned to the Material Plane after centuries of isolation. Whether you joined the Society out of gratitude, curiosity, or desperation, you are hardened by your harrowing flight from your doomed home.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sigilo, plus a Lore skill related to the terrain you lived in while on the demiplane (such as Cave Lore or Desert Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ykLHUNk8VnSuM87z]{Seguro (Stealth)}.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 10 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Tax Collector
entries.description:
Reviled but required, you were sent when taxes were due. Performing your job might have required travel y persuasion, or perhaps you were responsible for collecting taxes on trade. Either way, it sometimes meant dirty hys, y adventuring seemed the next logical step to you.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y the Lore skill for the settlement that employed you. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ar2DUlvDK4LDcH9J]{Coacción rápida}.

entries.name: Teacher (Performance)
entries.description:
You are incredibly knowledgeable, skilled, y perhaps even trained to teach children y adults about the world y its wonders. From books to classes, you're committed to imparting knowledge to all. Not everything can be taught or learned from a book, though, so you've become an adventurer to learn subjects more directly y bring that wisdom back to your students.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar, along with the Academia Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{Experienced Professional}.

entries.name: Teacher (Society)
entries.description:
You are incredibly knowledgeable, skilled, y perhaps even trained to teach children y adults about the world y its wonders. From books to classes, you're committed to imparting knowledge to all. Not everything can be taught or learned from a book, though, so you've become an adventurer to learn subjects more directly y bring that wisdom back to your students.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad, along with the Academia Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{Experienced Professional}.

entries.name: Teamster
entries.description:
You left your home a few months back for a life on the road, working for one caravan company y then another, always on the lookout for a new job y a better life. Last week, you were hired by the Bort Bargith's company in Elidir. You don't know anyone from the company just yet, but most of its members seem to be honest merchants y traders.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza y Saber mercantil. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nowEaHgIyij7im8F]{Adiestrar animal}.

entries.name: Tech Reliant
entries.description:
Some event, be it an accident, attack, or disaster, has left you horribly scarred by magic. Your body no longer tolerates magical healing, y you can't use magic, forcing you to rely on gadgets y ingenuity where others trust in spells y magical items. You might have been well-versed in magic before, or barely familiar with its use. This event may have injured your body in visible ways, but no matter the extent of your injuries, your body no longer interacts with healing magic in any capacity.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Medicina. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Medicina de guerra}skill feat, y a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells. Healing spells, healing magic items, y magical effects with the healing trait have no effect on you.

entries.name: Thassilonian Delver
entries.description:
As archaeologists uncovered y explored ever-larger numbers of Thassilonian ruins, you were among the eager explorers who sought out the Runelords' ancient secrets. You may have been the apprentice to another Pathfinder who perished on an expedition, leaving you their discoveries y notes. Or perhaps you explored several of these sites yourself, quickly learning to parse the arcane secrets before lest the eldritch magic extinguish your life.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y the Thassilonian History Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blMeVamjGz4ODWxq]{Arcane Sense}skill feat. Add Thassilonian to the list of additional languages you can learn for having a high Intelligence modifier.

Special You can select this background only if you have earned credit for at least 5 First Edition scenarios from Season 4 of the Pathfinder Society organized play campaign.

entries.name: Thassilonian Traveler
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lys

You come from ancient Thassilon, one of the citizens that appeared out of time alongside the city of Xin-Edasseril. You know many things that have been long forgotten... along with many things that are no longer correct.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y the Thassilon Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Conocimiento dudoso}.

entries.name: Thrune Loyalist
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Old Cheliax

Despite the setbacks Cheliax has suffered recently, your loyalties lie with the devil-backed House Thrune. You consider the current queen to be the rightful ruler of your homely, y you are willing to act against her enemies.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y the Hell Lore skill Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x7EMZNMavris2aHY]{Alumno del canon}.

entries.name: Thuvian Unifier
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Golden Road

You believe the city-states of Thuvia should be united into one nation under the rule of your home city (most commonly Aspenthar), y you're willing to do whatever it takes to make it happen.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y the Politics Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ar2DUlvDK4LDcH9J]{Coacción rápida}.

entries.name: Time Traveler
entries.description:
You come from a different time. Whether by your own doing or a terrible accident, powerful magic has resulted in you coming to this time from the future or from the past, but you are unable to return. You might be from New Thassilon, an entire nation of time travelers.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

You are trained in three Lore skills of your choice that represent your knowledge from your old time. You gain the Bend Time reaction.

entries.name: Manitas
entries.description:
Crear todo tipo de artilugios menores sacia tu sed de resolución de problemas. Tus aptitudes para la ingeniería tienen una deriva particularmente creativa, y nadie es capaz de decir con qué saldrás la próxima vez. Podría tratarse de un artilugio genial con un potencial tremendo... o podría explotar.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber de la ingenieria. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Especialidad artesana}.

entries.name: Tomb Born
entries.description:
Your parents conceived you for a fell purpose at a site tainted by death, like a wight's barrow, mass grave, or ossuary. Their reasons could be a mystery, or you might know of their gry design y seek to escape-or fulfill-their plans. Either way, you're at your most dangerous when near death.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Undead Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.jbmXxq56swDYw8hy]{Final Spite}reaction.

entries.name: Touched by Dahak
entries.description:
[Legacy - Age of Ashes]

As the manifestation of Dahak was destroyed, a shard of the dragon god's wrathful nature infused you, resulting in a violent temper, strange apocalyptic dreams, an obsession with dragon hunting, or some other touch of his influence.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Dragon Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler}.

entries.name: Toymaker
entries.description:
