You delight in making little trinkets for children of all ages, y seeing their faces light up thanks to one of your creations brings joy to your heart. Perhaps you sell your wares from a particular shop or from the back of a wagon as you travel from town to town.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y Saber mercantil. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Especialidad artesana}skill feat, choosing Artistry, Blacksmithing, Glassmaking, Leatherworking, Tailoring, or Woodworking as your specialty.

entries.name: Trade Consortium Underling
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Absalom y Starstone Isle

Your experience as a ledger-keeper for one of Absalom's trade guilds has made you a canny investor y shrewd entrepreneur.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Business Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sMm0UfYxEPpq2Yzd]{Experienced Professional}.

entries.name: Trailblazer
entries.description:
Uncharted realms have always intrigued you, y you've explored y mapped large territories in service to merchants, governments, or your own curiosity. Where some see a blank spot on a map, you see the potential for something new y undiscovered.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia y the Cartography Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Terrain Expertise}skill feat with one terrain you've explored (such as forest or underground).

entries.name: Translator
entries.description:
In your youth, you learned to transcribe books y translate scrolls to preserve knowledge or perhaps to aid wealthy merchants y politicians. Whether you set out to make your own fortune or are drawn to decipher the strangest codes, your linguistic training will guide your discoveries.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y Saber de la escritura. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingüe}.

entries.name: Truth Seeker
entries.description:
Whether you are a local or from out of town, you've heard rumors that Breachill's past contains a hidden secret. Perhaps you've heard strange rumors that the town's founder, Lamond Breachton, was not the hero everyone touts, or maybe your grymother heard stories from her own grymother that contradict the town's accepted narrative of its establishment. In the pursuit of the truth, you've learned to navigate the tangles of politics, y to never take anyone's word at face value.

You plan to join the Call for Heroes so that you can make yourself known to the council, or perhaps even ingratiating yourself to them, so you can seek the truth y eventually uncover Breachill's secrets!

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar y the Politics Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Dvz54d6aPhjsmUux]{Miénteme}.

entries.name: Tyrant Witness
entries.description:
When Tar-Baphon broke free of Gallowspire, you saw him emerge. When the god-slaying lich obliterated Vigil y Roslar's Coffer, you scrambled to safety. y when necrotic rainfall swept through the lys y the Gallowgarden grew, you weathered the storms. Others talk of what the Whispering Tyrant's return did to Lastwall, but you were there. y it changed you.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Undead Lore skill. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{Disrupt Undead} as a divine innate cantrip. As normal, the cantrip heightens to half your level rounded up.

entries.name: Ulfen Raider
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lys

You are an Ulfen warrior, feared among Avistan for the merciless y devastating raids your people once conducted along the shores. Though the days of these Ulfen raids are largely past, you have been trained to strike terror into the hearts of those who face you.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación y Saber de la navegación. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Mirada intimidante}.

entries.name: Undercover Contender
entries.description:
Gangsters y cheats seem as drawn to the Ruby Phoenix Tournament as piranhas to a bloody hippo, y you're dead set on making sure this tournament is as scyal-free as possible. Your reasons are your own - maybe a high-ranking official in Goka has tasked you with the case, or maybe foul play led to losing someone dear to you in the last tournament. Maybe you just hate to see fair fighters get knocked out by crooked contenders. Whatever your motives, you've promised to be in the ring in case anyone tries to derail the contest. The Golden League crime syndicate is the most obvious suspect, what with their meddling in the Ruby Phoenix Tournament a decade ago, but maybe there will be others - unscrupulous contenders trying to pull one over on Hao Jin, perhaps, or an entirely new devious conspiracy hoping to hijack the event for their own evil purposes. In any case, you'll be around to deliver the hammer of justice. You've told a small squad of your closest confidants about your mission, y you've managed to secure a spot in the tournament's prequalifier along with them. You y your team have to win fights to stay in the competition long enough to make sure things go smoothly. If that means you end up being the Ruby Phoenix Champions, all the better.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Carisma o Destreza, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Deception y Saber de los bajos fondos. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HEBXaS656MZTiWFu]{Lengthy Diversion}.

entries.name: Undercover Lotus Guard
entries.description:
It's a well-known secret that for every playhouse in the Ivy District, there's an underground criminal element lurking somewhere in the shadows. To get intel on the occultists, assassins, y thieves' guilds that pull the strings of power in the Ivy District, the Lotus Guard trains some of the best undercover agents y operatives in all of Absalom. You're one such agent, y you've put your life on the line more times than you can count by getting close to the Ivy's most dangerous criminals. Your risky missions y thrill-seeking derring-do have earned you many accolades-but also no shortage of enemies.

You transferred to the Edgewatch after your cover was unexpectedly blown y you needed a safe place to lie low away from the Ivy District. With your mastery of disguise y your ability to confidently converse with criminal masterminds, it won't be long before you've made yourself an indispensable undercover operator in this precinct as well.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Engañar, Art Lore, y Underworld Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, y Intimidation checks to Interact with Lotus Guards y high-ranking criminals like guild masters, gang leaders, y mob bosses. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Mentiroso encantador}.

entries.name: Undersea Enthusiast
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - High Seas

You love diving y exploring the world beneath the waves, y long periods of swimming have trained you to move easily through the water. You're also fascinated by undersea creatures y cultures-y may even have a trace of one of them in your own lineage.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Atletismo y the Ocean Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iOY6YfGBaOvMNAor]{Merodeador subactuático}.

entries.name: Undertaker
entries.description:
People die. This is the unfortunate fact of life on which you've founded your business, because wherever people die, there is a demy for mortuary services. You might be a Pharasmin priest or a secular professional, but your job is seeing to the body, comforting the bereaved, y making sure that the deceased goes to their ultimate reward with all due dignity. Of course, someone in your position sees a lot of strange deaths, y chances are one of them set you on the road to adventure.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Medicina y a Lore skill specializing in one local type of undead. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ws9JlysHcFoz6WAQ]{Forensic Acumen}.

entries.name: Unsponsored (Diplomacy)
entries.description:
You have aspirations of attending the Magaambya academy of magic, but fate seemed to thwart you at every turn. You were unable to obtain a sponsorship y lost a collection of helpful textbooks to unexpected insect damage. You nevertheless made the long trip to Nantambu through terrible weather, uncharacteristically bad roads, y indifferent fellow travelers. Yet you have persevered. Now that you are here, alone but determined, you won't let anything sty in your way.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Impresión de grupo}skill feat. You're also trained in Academia Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Tempest Sun-Mages.

entries.name: Unsponsored (Intimidation)
entries.description:
You have aspirations of attending the Magaambya academy of magic, but fate seemed to thwart you at every turn. You were unable to obtain a sponsorship y lost a collection of helpful textbooks to unexpected insect damage. You nevertheless made the long trip to Nantambu through terrible weather, uncharacteristically bad roads, y indifferent fellow travelers. Yet you have persevered. Now that you are here, alone but determined, you won't let anything sty in your way.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Mirada intimidante}skill feat. You're also trained in Academia Lore.

Your recommended primary branch is the Tempest Sun-Mages.

entries.name: Ustalavic Academic
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

You were educated at a famed Ustalavic academy, such as the University of Lepidstadt or the Sincomakti School of Sciences, y received quality instruction in advanced concepts of mathematics, science, y engineering.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Academia Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.P6icK2DbRoZ3H6kc]{Skill Training}.

entries.name: Varisian Wyerer
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lys

You have spent your youth wyering the lys of Varisia y beyond among the brightly painted wagons of a Varisian caravan. You have heard endless tales of your people's history y lore, y have learned many songs y stories from the disparate people you have met.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y Saber del circo. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7LB00jkh6JaJr3vS]{Interpretación fascinante}.

entries.name: Vidrian Reformer
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Mwangi Expanse

You know that the only way your homely of Vidrian can remain free from outside conquerors is by forging a strong y unified government. As such, you seek to bind your fellow citizens together through careful diplomacy y force of personality-or, if necessary, subterfuge y intrigue.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia y the Politics Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{Confraternización}.

entries.name: Wyering Preacher
entries.description:
While you once spoke to a small congregation in a ramshackle church, those days are behind you now. Your church was destroyed, your congregants scattered, y now you meyer the lys holding a worn copy of your religious text in one hy, y a fiery conviction in the other.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One boost must be to Constitution o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y a Lore skill associated with the deity you preach for (such as Pharasmin Lore). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BqceQIKE0lwIS98s]{Pilgrim's Token}.

entries.name: Wanted Witness
entries.description:
You saw something you shouldn't have, plain y simple. The shame is that you don't even know what it is, exactly, that you saw.

After moving to Alkenstar, you swiftly fell in love with the City of Smog, but you found it difficult to get a foothold in the fast-paced metropolis. Luckily, a chance invitation promised good work for someone with your unique social talents. You went to an inconspicuous chamber in a humble tower somewhere in the Capital District. There, you met some clearly powerful, clearly corrupt members of the Alkenstar elite. Among the faces you recognized were the notorious mogul Ambrost Mugly y the steely-eyed shieldmarshal Anjelique Loveless. Before you were asked to leave, you made quite an impression-but not a good one.

Not only did you not make the cut for whatever kinds of jobs were on offer that day, but you soon discovered that you couldn't get a room at any inn in the city, y there were wanted posters with your name on them plastered all over town. Friends y families turned their backs on you, afraid to get involved. Clearly, someone at that meeting-Mugly, maybe, or perhaps Loveless- believed you were a liability, y they had you excised from Alkenstar society. All you want is to be able to walk the streets without fearing for your life, y there's only one way to make that happen: find the villains responsible for your predicament y get them to undo the curse now attached to your name.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Sociedad y the Alkenstar Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yUuU9xyotrpwpTyC]{Read Lips}.

entries.name: Ward
entries.description:
When you were young, you became the ward of another house-boarded, fed, y educated, but never quite a part of the family. Perhaps you had to tend to their needs in return for feeding y raising you, or perhaps you were provided for but disregarded. Now, adventuring is your chance to grow y roam free.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Interpretar y the Genealogy Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7LB00jkh6JaJr3vS]{Interpretación fascinante}.

entries.name: Combatiente
entries.description:
Cuando eras más joven, te adentraste en la batalla como mercenario, un combatiente defendiendo a un pueblo nómada, miembro de una milicia o de un ejército. Podrías haber querido apartarte de la estructura regimentada de estas fuerzas, o podrías haber sido siempre un combatiente independiente como lo eres ahora.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Fuerza o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Intimidación, y Saber de la guerra. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Mirada intimidante}.

entries.name: Waste Walker
entries.description:
Whether you grew up in the Mana Wastes or another similarly desolate place, you quickly learned that only the strong survive. You y your family were forced to evade monsters, mutants, wild magic, y worse, as each new day heralded the possibility of a danger or threat you'd never seen before. You learned to adapt to the worst possible conditions y how to forage y survive in a place few others would dare to live.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. One boost must be to Fuerza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Supervivencia, y Mana Wastes Lore (or another similar Lore skill associated with the wastes where you grew up). Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8qebBeOJsyRIchcu]{Forager}.

entries.name: Whispering Way Scion
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Eye of Dread

Your family has long been associated with the enigmatic death cult known as the Whispering Way, which was recently responsible for the terrible devastation in the nation of Lastwall. Whether or not you have followed in their footsteps, you know many of the philosophy's secrets.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Religión y the Undead Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x7EMZNMavris2aHY]{Alumno del canon}.

entries.name: Wildwood Local
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Shining Kingdoms

You might have been born y raised among the druids of the Verduran Forest, or you may have spent time among them as an adult y come to know their ways.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Naturaleza as well as the Forest Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WC4xLBGmBsdOdHWu]{Medicina natural}.

entries.name: Willing Host
entries.description:
You speak to spirits only you can perceive: wispy shreds of lost souls, household guardians, ancestral spirits, y other entities. You can negotiate with these beings, allowing them into your body to impart knowledge or aid in a task for the price of a favor.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Sabiduria o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Spirit Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.yXk0G8l0leaqHh1U]{Host Spirit}action.

entries.name: Winter's Child
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lys

Your or one of your ancestors hails from Irrisen, y some spark of the icy region's magic has manifested itself within your bones. The blood of Baba Yaga's legacy runs in your veins, y you are at one with the mysteries y dangers of the frozen ly.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades the Arcana skill y the Weather Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.blMeVamjGz4ODWxq]{Arcane Sense}.

entries.name: Wished Alive
entries.description:
Once you were a simple construct or inanimate doll, but due to a deeply felt wish, either yours or another's, you came to life, y so you're now a living, breathing creature.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Constitution o Carisma, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Diplomacia. Once per day, you can fervently wish for something you could work towards achieving as a single action which has the concentrate trait. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the first skill check you attempt before the end of your turn to fulfill that wish.

entries.name: Witch Wary
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Saga Lys

You have little love or trust for spellcraft y those who practice it, y have developed a paranoid knack for recognizing such tricks. You are constantly on guard for the magic of witches y have been trained to spot the signs of those with minds affected by magic.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Inteligencia, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Ocultismo y the Curse Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hDGosy2ZTwnyctEP]{Identificar extrañezas}.

entries.name: Witchlight Follower
entries.description:
While in a dismal forest or remote swamp, you caught sight of a string of lights bobbing through the trees. You stepped forward for a closer look, y then still further when the lights retreated a few paces. Then you remembered the rumors. Will-o'-wisps, rushlights, corpse lanterns—whatever they're called—such evil creatures lead people to their doom. With a supreme effort of will, you broke free from the alluring enchantment, y you've resolved to never let the strange lights of remote wildernesses claim you again.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Destreza o Sabiduria, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Survival y the Wisp Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4tTkRyOQ0VuRBac3]{Terrain Expertise}skill feat with both swamp terrain y subterranean bodies of water.

entries.name: Wonder Taster
entries.description:
Prerequisite Region - Broken Lys

Having once sampled Numerian fluids, you've tasted knowledge beyond comprehension. You are driven to recapture that astounding experience.

Elige dos mejoras de característica. Una debe ser a Inteligencia o Constitution, y la otra es una mejora de característica gratuita.

Estás entrenado en las habilidades Artesanía y the Alchemical Lore skill. Obtienes la dote de habilidad @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting}.
